src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=z_1%2C%5C%2Cz_2%2C%5C%2Cz_3%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"z_1,\\,z_2,\\,z_3\\in\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，我们有：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cforall%5C%2Cz_1%2C%5C%2Cz_2%2C%5C%2Cz_3%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%5C%2C%3A%5C%2C%28z_1%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7Dz_2%29%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7Dz_3%3Dz_1%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7D%28z_2%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7Dz_3%29.%5Ctag%7B2.3%7D\" alt=\"\\forall\\,z_1,\\,z_2,\\,z_3\\in\\mathbb{Z}\\,:\\,(z_1+_{\\mathbb{Z}}z_2)+_{\\mathbb{Z}}z_3=z_1+_{\\mathbb{Z}}(z_2+_{\\mathbb{Z}}z_3).\\tag{2.3}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>除此以外我们还知道任何整数与整数 </u><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0\" alt=\"0\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的和都是该整数本身。比如：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=4%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7D0%3D0%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7D4%3D4%2C%5Cquad+-3%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7D0%3D0%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7D%28-3%29%3D-3.%5Ctag%7B2.4%7D\" alt=\"4+_{\\mathbb{Z}}0=0+_{\\mathbb{Z}}4=4,\\quad -3+_{\\mathbb{Z}}0=0+_{\\mathbb{Z}}(-3)=-3.\\tag{2.4}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>即对于任意一个整数</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=z%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"z\\in\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>而言，我们有：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cforall%5C%2Cz%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%5C%2C%3A%5C%2Cz%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7D0%3D0%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7Dz%3Dz.%5Ctag%7B2.5%7D\" alt=\"\\forall\\,z\\in\\mathbb{Z}\\,:\\,z+_{\\mathbb{Z}}0=0+_{\\mathbb{Z}}z=z.\\tag{2.5}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>因为整数</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0\" alt=\"0\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的这种性质，我们将整数</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0\" alt=\"0\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>称为整数集</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>中的 <b><i>对加法</i></b></u> <b><i><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7D\" alt=\"+_{\\mathbb{Z}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/></i></b> <u><b><i>的单位元素 </i></b>。同样是为了与将来群中的单位元素做对比，我们将</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的单位元素</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0\" alt=\"0\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>记作</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0_%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"0_\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。</p><p><u>此外，对整数集中的每一个整数都存在一个“与之相反的”整数，使得两者的和为</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0_%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"0_\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>。比如：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-5%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7D5%3D5%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7D%28-5%29%3D0_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7D.%5Ctag%7B2.6%7D\" alt=\"-5+_{\\mathbb{Z}}5=5+_{\\mathbb{Z}}(-5)=0_{\\mathbb{Z}}.\\tag{2.6}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>所以一般的，对于任意一个整数</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=z%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"z\\in\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，我们有：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cforall%5C%2Cz%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%2C%5Cquad+z%2B_%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%28-z%29%3D%28-z%29%2B_%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7Dz%3D0_%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D.%5Ctag%7B2.7%7D\" alt=\"\\forall\\,z\\in\\mathbb{Z},\\quad z+_\\mathbb{Z}(-z)=(-z)+_\\mathbb{Z}z=0_\\mathbb{Z}.\\tag{2.7}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>这样的一个整数</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-z\" alt=\"-z\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>我们称为整数集</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>中的<b><i>整数</i></b></u> <b><i><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=z\" alt=\"z\" eeimg=\"1\"/></i></b> <u><b><i>的对加法</i></b></u> <b><i><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=+%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7D\" alt=\" +_{\\mathbb{Z}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/></i></b> <u><b><i>的逆元</i></b>。同样是为了与将来群中的逆元做对比，这里我们将整数</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=z\" alt=\"z\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的逆元记作</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-z_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7D\" alt=\"-z_{\\mathbb{Z}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。</p><p><u>最后我们要说的是两个整数的和一定还是一个整数，我们将此性质称为<b><i>整数集对其上的加法</i></b></u> <b><i><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%2B_%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"+_\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/></i></b> <u><b><i>是封闭的</i></b> 。</u></p><p><u>另外，我们可以将</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>上的加法</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%2B_%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"+_\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>看做是一种作用，这个作用的效果是将输入的两个整数通过相加的方式变成第三个整数。这就意味着我们可以将</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>上的加法</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%2B_%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"+_\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>看做是一个映射：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%2B_%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%2C%5Cquad+%28z_1%2Cz_2%29%5Cmapsto+z_1%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7Dz_2.%5Ctag%7B2.8%7D\" alt=\"+_\\mathbb{Z}:\\mathbb{Z}\\times\\mathbb{Z}\\to\\mathbb{Z},\\quad (z_1,z_2)\\mapsto z_1+_{\\mathbb{Z}}z_2.\\tag{2.8}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>这样一个映射也可以说明整数集对其上的加法</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%2B_%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"+_\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>是封闭的。</u></p><blockquote><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7BRemark%3A%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\bm{\\rm{Remark:}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/><u>显然，整数集上的单位元素是唯一的，即为</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0_%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"0_\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，且对每个整数</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=z%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"z\\in\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，其逆元也是唯一的，即为</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-z%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"-z\\in\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  。(<u>注意，这里 <b><i>不要 </i></b>说成整数集中的逆元是唯一的</u>)</blockquote><p><u>大家如果能完全理解上述有关整数的加法的例子话那么就成功了</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=99.%5Coverline%7B9%7D%5C%25\" alt=\"99.\\overline{9}\\%\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>啦～因为通过类比，我们可以非常轻松又快速地理解群的定义。下面我们就给出群的定义：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccolor%7Bblue%7D%7B%5Clarge%7B%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7BDefinition%5Cquad+2.1%3A%7D%7D%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\color{blue}{\\large{\\bm{\\rm{Definition\\quad 2.1:}}}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>设 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=M\" alt=\"M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>是一个集合，且设</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccirc_M\" alt=\"\\circ_M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 为  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=M\" alt=\"M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>上的一个运算：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccirc_M%3AM%5Ctimes+M%5Cto+M%2C%5Cquad+%28m_1%2Cm_2%29%5Cmapsto+m_1%5Ccirc_M+m_2.%5Ctag%7B2.9%7D\" alt=\"\\circ_M:M\\times M\\to M,\\quad (m_1,m_2)\\mapsto m_1\\circ_M m_2.\\tag{2.9}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>则称结构</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28M%2C%5Ccirc_M%29\" alt=\"(M,\\circ_M)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>是一个 </u><b><i>群 </i></b><u>，当它满足以下条件时：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bi%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{i).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccirc_M\" alt=\"\\circ_M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>是可结合的；</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{ii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> (<u>至少</u>)<u>存在一个</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=e_M%5Cin+M\" alt=\"e_M\\in M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，使得对于所有的</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=m%5Cin+M\" alt=\"m\\in M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>有：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cforall%5C%2C+m%5Cin+M%5C%2C%3A%5C%2Ce_M%5Ccirc_M+m%3Dm%5Ccirc_M+e_M%3Dm.%5Ctag%7B2.10%7D\" alt=\"\\forall\\, m\\in M\\,:\\,e_M\\circ_M m=m\\circ_M e_M=m.\\tag{2.10}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>这样的一个</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=e_M%5Cin+M\" alt=\"e_M\\in M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>称为</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=M\" alt=\"M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>中的 <b><i>单位元素 </i></b>。</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{iii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>对于每个</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=m%5Cin+M\" alt=\"m\\in M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，存在</u>(<u>至少</u>)<u>一个</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=n_%7BM%7D%5Cin+M\" alt=\"n_{M}\\in M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，使得：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=m%5Ccirc_M+n_%7BM%7D%3Dn_%7BM%7D%5Ccirc_M+m%3De_M.%5Ctag%7B2.11%7D\" alt=\"m\\circ_M n_{M}=n_{M}\\circ_M m=e_M.\\tag{2.11}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Ccolor%7Bblue%7D%7B%5Cblacksquare%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\color{blue}{\\blacksquare}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><blockquote><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7BRemark%3A%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\bm{\\rm{Remark:}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/><u>显然，当我们将定义</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%7B%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7BDefinition%5Cquad+2.1%7D%7D%7D\" alt=\"{\\bm{\\rm{Definition\\quad 2.1}}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>中的集合</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=M\" alt=\"M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>换成集合</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，将运算</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccirc_M\" alt=\"\\circ_M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>换成整数集上的加法</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%2B_%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"+_\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，将集合</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=M\" alt=\"M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>中的单位元素</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=e_M\" alt=\"e_M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>换成整数集</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>中的单位元素</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0_%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"0_\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，将</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=m%2Cm_1%2Cm_2%5Cin+M\" alt=\"m,m_1,m_2\\in M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>换成</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=z%2Cz_1%2Cz_2%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"z,z_1,z_2\\in\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，将</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=n_M%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BM%7D\" alt=\"n_M\\in\\mathbb{M}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>换成</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-z_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%7D%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D\" alt=\"-z_{\\mathbb{Z}}\\in\\mathbb{Z}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>时我们就可以理解群的定义了。</u></blockquote><p><u>根据群的定义我们可以知道</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%2C%2B_%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%29\" alt=\"(\\mathbb{Z},+_\\mathbb{Z})\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>是一个群，我们将这个群称为</u> <u><b><i>整数加法群 </i></b></u>。</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccolor%7Bdarkorange%7D%7B%5Clarge%7B%5Cbm%7B%5Crm+%7BExercise%5Cquad+2.1%3A%7D%7D%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\color{darkorange}{\\large{\\bm{\\rm {Exercise\\quad 2.1:}}}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>请可各位读者朋友独立验证</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%2C%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%7D%29\" alt=\"(\\mathbb{R},+_{\\mathbb{R}})\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 与 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D%2C%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D%7D%29\" alt=\"(\\mathbb{C},+_{\\mathbb{C}})\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>也是两个群。且前者称为</u> <u><b><i>实数加法群 </i></b>，后者称为</u> <u><b><i>复数加法群</i></b></u> 。</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Ccolor%7Bdarkorange%7D%7B%5Cblacksquare%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\color{darkorange}{\\blacksquare}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>认识了什么是群之后我们就已经结束了三分之一的工作啦～打起精神，一鼓作气，把剩下的群的知识学完！下面将要介绍的一个重要的概念是 <b><i>群同态 。</i></b></u></p><h2><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5CLarge+%7B%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7B3%7D.%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\Large {\\bm{\\rm{3}.}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 群同态</h2><p><u>这个名词听起来挺高端的是吧？其实我们通过一个我们高中就学过的函数便可以“可视化”群同态这个概念，进而让这个概念变得很好理解。下面我们就从这个函数讲起。</u></p><p><u>这个函数就是自然底数</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=e\" alt=\"e\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的指数函数。我们知道同底数的</u>(<u>这里为</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=e\" alt=\"e\" eeimg=\"1\"/> )<u>指数运算律为：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cexp%28x_1%2Bx_2%29%3D%5Cexp%28x_1%29%5Ccdot%5Cexp%28x_2%29%2C%5Cquad+x_1%2C%5C%2Cx_2%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D.%5Ctag%7B3.1%7D\" alt=\"\\exp(x_1+x_2)=\\exp(x_1)\\cdot\\exp(x_2),\\quad x_1,\\,x_2\\in\\mathbb{R}.\\tag{3.1}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>我们知道</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cexp%28x%29\" alt=\"\\exp(x)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的定义域是实数集</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D\" alt=\"\\mathbb{R}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，值域是正实数集</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D\" alt=\"\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>。所以，不严谨地可以说：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cforall%5C%2Cx_1%2C%5C%2Cx_2%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5C%2C%3A%5C%2C%5Cexp%28x_1%29%5Ccdot%5Cexp%28x_2%29%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D.%5Ctag%7B3.2%7D\" alt=\"\\forall\\,x_1,\\,x_2\\in\\mathbb{R}\\,:\\,\\exp(x_1)\\cdot\\exp(x_2)\\in\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}.\\tag{3.2}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>此时我们可以将</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccdot\" alt=\"\\cdot\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>写为正实数集上的乘法，即</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccdot_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\cdot_{\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>。这是因为这里正实数集对</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccdot_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\cdot_{\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>是封闭的，即：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccdot_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%2C%5Cquad+%28%5Cexp%28x_1%29%2C%5Cexp%28x_2%29%29%5Cmapsto+%5Cexp%28x_1%29%5Ccdot_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%7D%5Cexp%28x_2%29%5Ctag%7B3.3%7D.\" alt=\"\\cdot_{\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}}:\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}\\times\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}\\to\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0},\\quad (\\exp(x_1),\\exp(x_2))\\mapsto \\exp(x_1)\\cdot_{\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}}\\exp(x_2)\\tag{3.3}.\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>又因为</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x_1%2C%5C%2Cx_2%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D\" alt=\"x_1,\\,x_2\\in\\mathbb{R}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，所以我们可以将</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%2B\" alt=\"+\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>写为实数域上的加法</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%7D\" alt=\"+_{\\mathbb{R}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>。如之前所述，</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%2C%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%7D%29\" alt=\"(\\mathbb{R},+_{\\mathbb{R}})\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>是一个群。并且容易验证</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%2C%5Ccdot_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%7D%29\" alt=\"(\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0},\\cdot_{\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}})\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>是一个乘法群</u>(<u>作为练习，请各位自行验证。注意，</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccdot_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\cdot_{\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的封闭性已经说过了，只需验证剩下三条即可</u>)<u>。于是现在我们得到了两个群，我们将两者分别定义为：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=G%3A%3D%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%2C%2B_%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%29%2C%5Cquad+H%3A%3D%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%2C%5Ccdot_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%7D%29.%5Ctag%7B3.4%7D\" alt=\"G:=(\\mathbb{R},+_\\mathbb{R}),\\quad H:=(\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0},\\cdot_{\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}}).\\tag{3.4}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>则在这两个群之间的映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cexp%3AG%5Cto+H\" alt=\"\\exp:G\\to H\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>满足：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cforall%5C%2Cx_1%2C%5C%2Cx_2%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5C%2C%3A%5C%2C%5Cexp%5Cleft%28x_1%2B_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%7Dx_2%5Cright%29%3D%5Cexp%28x_1%29%5Ccdot_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%7D%5Cexp%28x_2%29.%5Ctag%7B3.5%7D+\" alt=\"\\forall\\,x_1,\\,x_2\\in\\mathbb{R}\\,:\\,\\exp\\left(x_1+_{\\mathbb{R}}x_2\\right)=\\exp(x_1)\\cdot_{\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}}\\exp(x_2).\\tag{3.5} \" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>如果现在我们将群</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%2C%2B_%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%29\" alt=\"(\\mathbb{R},+_\\mathbb{R})\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>与群</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%2C%5Ccdot_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%7D%29\" alt=\"(\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0},\\cdot_{\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}})\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>换成为两个一般的群</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28G%2C%5Ccirc_G%29\" alt=\"(G,\\circ_G)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 和 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28H%2C%5Ccirc_H%29\" alt=\"(H,\\circ_H)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，群</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%2C%2B_%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%29\" alt=\"(\\mathbb{R},+_\\mathbb{R})\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>与群</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%2C%5Ccdot_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%7D%29\" alt=\"(\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0},\\cdot_{\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}})\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>之间的映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cexp\" alt=\"\\exp\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>换成任意一个映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=f\" alt=\"f\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，但是使</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=f\" alt=\"f\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>仍保持性质：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cforall%5C%2Cg_1%2C%5C%2Cg_2%5Cin+G%5C%2C%3A%5C%2Cf%28g_1%5Ccirc_G+g_2%29%3Df%28g_1%29%5Ccirc_H+f%28g_2%29.%5Ctag%7B3.6%7D\" alt=\"\\forall\\,g_1,\\,g_2\\in G\\,:\\,f(g_1\\circ_G g_2)=f(g_1)\\circ_H f(g_2).\\tag{3.6}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>则  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=f\" alt=\"f\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>就称为群</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=G\" alt=\"G\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>与群</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=H\" alt=\"H\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>之间的一个群同态。</u></p><blockquote><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7BRemark%3A%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\bm{\\rm{Remark:}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/><u>可以将式</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%283.6%29\" alt=\"(3.6)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>与式</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%283.5%29\" alt=\"(3.5)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>做一个类比：</u><br/> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Barray%7D%7Bl%7D+%26x_i%3Dg_i%2C%5Cquad+i%3D1%2C2%2C%5C%5C+%26G%3D%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%2C%5C%5C+%26H%3D%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%2C%5C%5C+%26f%3D%5Cexp%2C%5C%5C+%26%5Ccirc_G%3D%2B_%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%2C%5C%5C+%26%5Ccirc_H%3D%5Ccdot_%7B%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%7D.+%5Cend%7Barray%7D%5C%5C\" alt=\"\\begin{array}{l} &amp;x_i=g_i,\\quad i=1,2,\\\\ &amp;G=\\mathbb{R},\\\\ &amp;H=\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0},\\\\ &amp;f=\\exp,\\\\ &amp;\\circ_G=+_\\mathbb{R},\\\\ &amp;\\circ_H=\\cdot_{\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}}. \\end{array}\\\\\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>这样群同态就好理解了。</blockquote><p><u>下面我就要给出群同态的定义了。</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccolor%7Bblue%7D%7B%5Clarge%7B%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7BDefinition%5Cquad+3.1%3A%7D%7D%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\color{blue}{\\large{\\bm{\\rm{Definition\\quad 3.1:}}}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>设  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28G%2C%5Ccirc_G%29\" alt=\"(G,\\circ_G)\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  与 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28H%2C%5Ccirc_H%29\" alt=\"(H,\\circ_H)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>是两个群。一个从群</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=G\" alt=\"G\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>到群</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=H\" alt=\"H\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的群同态是一个映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=f%3AG%5Cto+H\" alt=\"f:G\\to H\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，对该映射有：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cforall%5C%2Cg_1%2C%5C%2Cg_2%5Cin+G%5C%2C%3A%5C%2Cf%28g_1%5Ccirc_G+g_2%29%3Df%28g_1%29%5Ccirc_H+f%28g_2%29.%5Ctag%7B3.7%7D\" alt=\"\\forall\\,g_1,\\,g_2\\in G\\,:\\,f(g_1\\circ_G g_2)=f(g_1)\\circ_H f(g_2).\\tag{3.7}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>我们将所有从群</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=G\" alt=\"G\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>到群</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=H\" alt=\"H\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的同态</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=f\" alt=\"f\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的集合记作</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathrm%7BHom%7D%28G%2CH%29\" alt=\"\\mathrm{Hom}(G,H)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>。而且最为正规的记法为：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathrm%7BHom%7D_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BGroup%7D%7D%28%28G%2C%5Ccirc_G%29%2C%28H%2C%5Ccirc_H%29%29.%5Ctag%7B3.8%7D+\" alt=\"\\mathrm{Hom}_{\\mathrm{Group}}((G,\\circ_G),(H,\\circ_H)).\\tag{3.8} \" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Ccolor%7Bblue%7D%7B%5Cblacksquare%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\color{blue}{\\blacksquare}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><h2><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5CLarge+%7B%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7B4%7D.%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\Large {\\bm{\\rm{4}.}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 置换与置换群</h2><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%7B%5Cbm%7B4.1%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large{\\bm{4.1}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b>置换</b></p><p><u>新的知识又出现啦！我们还是先讲一个直观的例子。</u></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-06ac1fb9664101089a9a6a4184a1b013_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"775\" data-rawheight=\"502\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"775\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-06ac1fb9664101089a9a6a4184a1b013_r.jpg\"/><figcaption>图片1</figcaption></figure><p>如图片 1 所示，<u>我们将一个正方形的顶点自左上开始，按照顺时针方向从</u> ① 到 ④ <u>进行了编号。这样做的目的是为了让大家能够最直观的看到这个正方形所做的所有旋转和镜像变换。</u></p><p><u>现在我们来总结一下上面正方形的八种变换，它们分别是：什么也不做 </u><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathrm%7BId%7D\" alt=\"\\mathrm{Id}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>围绕中心做逆时针</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=90%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D%2C%5C%2C180%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D%2C%5C%2C270%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"90^{\\circ},\\,180^{\\circ},\\,270^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的旋转，关于两条平行于边的对称轴的镜像，以及关于两个对角线的镜像。</u></p><p><u>这样用文字描述变换实在是很不方便，所以我们现在来做一件有意思的事情，就是使用数字来表示这些变换。首先我们按照从</u> ①<img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28%3D1%29\" alt=\"(=1)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 到 ④<img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28%3D4%29\" alt=\"(=4)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的顺序将处于初始状态的正方形的顶点写在一个括号中，比如像这样：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B4.1.1%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{4.1.1}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>这里需要注意：处于初始状态与不对这个正方形做任何变换不是一回事！现在我们让这个写有初始状态顶点所对应的数字的括号变得大一些：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%5C%5C+%5Cstar+%26+%5Cstar+%26+%5Cstar+%26%5Cstar+%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D%5Ctag%7B4.1.2%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 \\\\ \\star &amp; \\star &amp; \\star &amp;\\star \\end{pmatrix}\\tag{4.1.2}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>即我们在原先的括号下面又增加了一行，那么这一行要写什么呢？在回答这个问题之前我们要明确的是，除了不对正方形做变换这种情况以外，其他七种情况下，只要对正方形做了变换，那么变换之后正方形的每个顶点数字相对于初始状态的顶点数字都发生了变化。于是这一行要写的就是：正方形做了某一次变换后，相对于初始状态的顶点对应数字的变化。举两个具体的例子好了，首先就是最特殊的，我们不对正方形做任何变换，那么此时正方形的状态与处于初始状态时是一致的，即顶点</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>依然对应顶点</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，顶点</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2\" alt=\"2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>依然对应顶点</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2\" alt=\"2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ...<u>等等，所以此时第二行应该写的是：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%5C%5C+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B4.1.3%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 \\\\ 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{4.1.3}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>再比如正方形做了一个</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=270%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"270^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的旋转，那么对于旋转之后的顶点我们有：顶点</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=4\" alt=\"4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>对应了初始状态的顶点</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>；顶点</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>对应了初始状态的顶点</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2\" alt=\"2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>；顶点</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2\" alt=\"2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>对应了初始状态的顶点</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3\" alt=\"3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>；顶点</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3\" alt=\"3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>对应了初始状态的顶点</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=4\" alt=\"4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>。于是此时，我们的第二行应该写：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%5C%5C+4+%26+1+%26+2+%26+3+%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B4.1.4%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 \\\\ 4 &amp; 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{4.1.4}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccolor%7Bdarkorange%7D%7B%5Clarge%7B%5Cbm%7B%5Crm+%7BExercise%5Cquad+4.1.1%3A%7D%7D%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\color{darkorange}{\\large{\\bm{\\rm {Exercise\\quad 4.1.1:}}}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>请大家尝试将剩余的</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=6\" alt=\"6\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的情况写出来。</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Ccolor%7Bdarkorange%7D%7B%5Cblacksquare%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\color{darkorange}{\\blacksquare}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>这样我们就实现了通过数字取描述正方形的这八种变换了。因为我们可以将处于初始状态的被数字</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%5Csim+4\" alt=\"1\\sim 4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>标记的正方形的四个顶点看成是</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>号到</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=4\" alt=\"4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>号这四个位置，然后正方形每做一次变换这四个位置上的某几个数字就会出现更替，我们将更替之后的数字与</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>号到</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=4\" alt=\"4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>号这四个位置一一对应起来就可以描述这种变换了。</u></p><p><u>很显然，数字的更替意味着数字相对于初始状态时的位置发生了变换，因此，我们将这些变换都称为 <b><i>置换 </i></b>。</u></p><p><u>通过上述例子，相信大家对置换的概念已经有了一个基本的认识了，现在我们来深化一下置换的概念。我们还是继续上面的例子。</u></p><p><u>现在让我们 <b><i>脱离正方形这个实体 </i></b>，而仅考虑</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2C2%2C3%2C4\" alt=\"1,2,3,4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>这四个数字。我们还是先将</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2C2%2C3%2C4\" alt=\"1,2,3,4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>按照顺序写在一个括号中的第一行：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%5C%5C+%5Cstar+%26+%5Cstar+%26+%5Cstar+%26+%5Cstar++%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B4.1.5%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 \\\\ \\star &amp; \\star &amp; \\star &amp; \\star  \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{4.1.5}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>这里的第二行我们写</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2C2%2C3%2C4\" alt=\"1,2,3,4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>这四个数字在做某种重新排列之后的结果，比如</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2%2C1%2C4%2C3\" alt=\"2,1,4,3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%5C%5C+2+%26+1+%26+4+%26+3++%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B4.1.6%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 \\\\ 2 &amp; 1 &amp; 4 &amp; 3  \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{4.1.6}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccolor%7Bdarkorange%7D%7B%5Clarge%7B%5Cbm%7B%5Crm+%7BExercise%5Cquad+4.1.2%3A%7D%7D%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\color{darkorange}{\\large{\\bm{\\rm {Exercise\\quad 4.1.2:}}}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%5C%5C+2+%26+1+%26+4+%26+3++%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5C%5C\" alt=\"\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 \\\\ 2 &amp; 1 &amp; 4 &amp; 3  \\end{pmatrix}.\\\\\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>对应了之前正方形的八种变换中的哪一种？</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Ccolor%7Bdarkorange%7D%7B%5Cblacksquare%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\color{darkorange}{\\blacksquare}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>显然，第一行的数字经过这“某种重新排列”之后被重新排序，重新排序的结果是第二行的元素。现在我将所有的对应关系写出来，以方便大家理解：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Balign%2A%7D+%26+1%5Cto+2+%5C%5C+%26+2%5Cto+1+%5C%5C+%26+3%5Cto+4+%5C%5C+%26+4%5Cto+3.+%5Cend%7Balign%2A%7D%5Ctag%7B4.1.7%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{align*} &amp; 1\\to 2 \\\\ &amp; 2\\to 1 \\\\ &amp; 3\\to 4 \\\\ &amp; 4\\to 3. \\end{align*}\\tag{4.1.7}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>通过所列出的所有对应关系我们可以发现：这种所谓的“重新排列”的变换实际上是一种映射关系，即</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2C2%2C3%2C4\" alt=\"1,2,3,4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>这四个数字中的每一个数字都通过这种映射变成 </u><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbm%7B1%2C2%2C3%2C4%7D\" alt=\"\\bm{1,2,3,4}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u><b><i>这四个数字中的 </i></b>另一个。我们现在将该映射记作</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，然后我们可以将上面列出的四种关系写为：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Balign%2A%7D+%26+1%5Cto+%5Csigma%281%29%3D2+%5C%5C+%26+2%5Cto+%5Csigma%282%29%3D1+%5C%5C+%26+3%5Cto+%5Csigma%283%29%3D4+%5C%5C+%26+4%5Cto+%5Csigma%284%29%3D3.+%5Cend%7Balign%2A%7D.%5Ctag%7B4.1.8%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{align*} &amp; 1\\to \\sigma(1)=2 \\\\ &amp; 2\\to \\sigma(2)=1 \\\\ &amp; 3\\to \\sigma(3)=4 \\\\ &amp; 4\\to \\sigma(4)=3. \\end{align*}.\\tag{4.1.8}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>现在我们可以说：</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2C2%2C3%2C4\" alt=\"1,2,3,4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>这种排列顺序经过映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的作用变成了</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2%2C1%2C4%2C3\" alt=\"2,1,4,3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>这种排列顺序。现在我们将这种对应关系在之前的括号中可得：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%5C%5C+%5Csigma%281%29+%26+%5Csigma%282%29+%26+%5Csigma%283%29+%26+%5Csigma%284%29++%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B4.1.9%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 \\\\ \\sigma(1) &amp; \\sigma(2) &amp; \\sigma(3) &amp; \\sigma(4)  \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{4.1.9}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>当然，对于不同的重新排列我们的映射也是不同的，比如现在有如下的对应关系：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Balign%2A%7D+%26+1%5Cto+4+%5C%5C+%26+2%5Cto+1+%5C%5C+%26+3%5Cto+2+%5C%5C+%26+4%5Cto+3.+%5Cend%7Balign%2A%7D.%5Ctag%7B4.1.10%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{align*} &amp; 1\\to 4 \\\\ &amp; 2\\to 1 \\\\ &amp; 3\\to 2 \\\\ &amp; 4\\to 3. \\end{align*}.\\tag{4.1.10}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>显然，我们刚才的映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>并不能实现这种从</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2C2%2C3%2C4\" alt=\"1,2,3,4\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  到  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=4%2C1%2C2%2C3\" alt=\"4,1,2,3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的这种排列，因为比如</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma%281%29%3D2%5Cne+4\" alt=\"\\sigma(1)=2\\ne 4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>。但是我们可以找到另外一个映射，使得这个映射可以实现这种重新排列呀。比如我们可以将这个映射记作</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ctau\" alt=\"\\tau\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>，即：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Balign%2A%7D+%26+1%5Cto+%5Ctau%281%29%3D4+%5C%5C+%26+2%5Cto+%5Ctau%282%29%3D1+%5C%5C+%26+3%5Cto+%5Ctau%283%29%3D2+%5C%5C+%26+4%5Cto+%5Ctau%284%29%3D3.+%5Cend%7Balign%2A%7D%5Ctag%7B4.1.11%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{align*} &amp; 1\\to \\tau(1)=4 \\\\ &amp; 2\\to \\tau(2)=1 \\\\ &amp; 3\\to \\tau(3)=2 \\\\ &amp; 4\\to \\tau(4)=3. \\end{align*}\\tag{4.1.11}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>现在我们在置换的概念上又更近一步了，但是还缺乏严谨性。比如映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/> (<u>或映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ctau\" alt=\"\\tau\" eeimg=\"1\"/> )<u>具有什么性质呢？对于任意一个可数的有限集合我们如何定义这个一个映射呢？这种映射之间可以复合吗？复合所产生的效果又是什么呢？下面我们就一一来回答这些问题。</u></p><p><u>从我们刚刚所说的例子中我们发现：无论是映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>还是映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ctau\" alt=\"\\tau\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>它们都具有以下性质：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bi%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{i).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>当映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/> (<u>或者映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ctau\" alt=\"\\tau\" eeimg=\"1\"/> )<u>作用于</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2C2%2C3%2C4\" alt=\"1,2,3,4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>这四个数字中的每个数字时，其结果也必然是这四个数字中的某一个，而不会出现别的数字。</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{ii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>当映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  (<u>或者映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ctau\" alt=\"\\tau\" eeimg=\"1\"/> )<u>作用于</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2C2%2C3%2C4\" alt=\"1,2,3,4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>这四个数字中的每个数字时，每个结果都是不同的，比如：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma%281%29%3D2%2C%5Cquad+%5Csigma%282%29%3D1%2C%5Cquad%5Csigma%283%29%3D4%2C%5Cquad+%5Csigma%284%29%3D3.%5Ctag%7B4.1.12%7D\" alt=\"\\sigma(1)=2,\\quad \\sigma(2)=1,\\quad\\sigma(3)=4,\\quad \\sigma(4)=3.\\tag{4.1.12}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{iii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>当映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  (<u>或者映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ctau\" alt=\"\\tau\" eeimg=\"1\"/> )<u>作用于</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2C2%2C3%2C4\" alt=\"1,2,3,4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>这四个数字中的每个数字时，每个数字在映射的作用下都会得到一个结果。</u></p><p><u>综合以上三条，我们现在可以说映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  (<u>或者映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ctau\" alt=\"\\tau\" eeimg=\"1\"/> )<u>是一个从集合</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ctau\" alt=\"\\tau\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>到自身上的一个双射。拿映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>举例，我们可以将它定义为：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma%3A%5C%7B1%2C2%2C3%2C4%5C%7D%5Cto%5C%7B1%2C2%2C3%2C4%5C%7D%2C%5Cquad+%5Csigma%28i%29%3Dj%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Ci%2Cj%3D1%2C2%2C3%2C4.%5Ctag%7B4.1.13%7D\" alt=\"\\sigma:\\{1,2,3,4\\}\\to\\{1,2,3,4\\},\\quad \\sigma(i)=j,\\,\\,i,j=1,2,3,4.\\tag{4.1.13}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>其实定义了这样一个映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>之后我们就得到了关于</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2C2%2C3%2C4\" alt=\"1,2,3,4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>的全部置换了。也就是说将来我们就不再区分</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  和  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ctau\" alt=\"\\tau\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>了。</u></p><p><u>现在我们来回答第二个问题：对于任意一个可数的有限集合我们如何定义这个一个映射呢？从上一个问题的答案中我们知道，这样的一个映射</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>是一个集合到自身的双射，而这里的集合必须是 <b><i>有限可数集合 </i></b>。</u></p><blockquote><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7BRemark%3A%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\bm{\\rm{Remark:}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/><u>这里的有限可数集合可以 <b><i>非常不严谨地</i></b> 理解为：可以清点这样一个集合中的全部元素。</u></blockquote><p><u>现在我们就来考察一个最简单的有限可数集合—由</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  到  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=n\" alt=\"n\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  这  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=n\" alt=\"n\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>个自然数构成的集合</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5C%7B1%2C2%2C%5Cldots%2Cn%5C%7D\" alt=\"\\{1,2,\\ldots,n\\}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>。则对于这样的一个集合我们可以定义置换</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  ：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma%3A%5C%7B1%2C2%2C%5Cldots%2Cn%5C%7D%5Cto%5C%7B1%2C2%2C%5Cldots%2Cn%5C%7D%2C%5Cquad+%5Csigma%28i%29%3Dj%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Ci%2Cj%3D1%2C2%2C%5Cldots%2Cn.%5Ctag%7B4.1.14%7D\" alt=\"\\sigma:\\{1,2,\\ldots,n\\}\\to\\{1,2,\\ldots,n\\},\\quad \\sigma(i)=j,\\,\\,i,j=1,2,\\ldots,n.\\tag{4.1.14}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>我们也可以将其写为括号的形式，即：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma%3D%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+%5Cldots+%26+n+%5C%5C+%5Csigma%281%29+%26+%5Csigma%282%29+%26+%5Cldots+%26+%5Csigma%28n%29++%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B4.1.15%7D\" alt=\"\\sigma=\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; \\ldots &amp; n \\\\ \\sigma(1) &amp; \\sigma(2) &amp; \\ldots &amp; \\sigma(n)  \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{4.1.15}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>更为一般地，我们可以对任意一个与集合</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5C%7B1%2C2%2C%5Cldots%2Cn%5C%7D\" alt=\"\\{1,2,\\ldots,n\\}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u><b><i>等势的 </i></b>集合</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=X%3D%5C%7Bx_1%2Cx_2%2C%5Cldots%2Cx_n%5C%7D\" alt=\"X=\\{x_1,x_2,\\ldots,x_n\\}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>定义置换：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma%3AX%5Cto+X%2C%5Cquad+%5Csigma%28x_i%29%3Dx_j%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Ci%2Cj%3D1%2C2%2C%5Cldots%2Cn.%5Ctag%7B4.1.16%7D\" alt=\"\\sigma:X\\to X,\\quad \\sigma(x_i)=x_j,\\,\\,i,j=1,2,\\ldots,n.\\tag{4.1.16}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><u>或将其写为括号的形式：</u></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma%3D%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+x_1+%26+x_2+%26+%5Cldots+%26+x_n+%5C%5C+%5Csigma%28x_1%29+%26+%5Csigma%28x_2%29+%26+%5Cldots+%26+%5Csigma%28x_n%29++%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B4.1.17%7D\" alt=\"\\sigma=\\begin{pmatrix} x_1 &amp; x_2 &amp; \\ldots &amp; x_n \\\\ \\sigma(x_1) &amp; \\sigma(x_2) &amp; \\ldots &amp; \\sigma(x_n)  \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{4.1.17}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><blockquote><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7BRemark%3A%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\bm{\\rm{Remark:}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/><u>这里的等势可以 <b><i>非常不严谨地 </i></b>理解为：集合</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=X%3D%5C%7Bx_1%2Cx_2%2C%5Cldots%2Cx_n%5C%7D\" alt=\"X=\\{x_1,x_2,\\ldots,x_n\\}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>与集合</u> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5C%7B1%2C2%2C%5Cldots%2Cn%5C%7D\" alt=\"\\{1,2,\\ldots,n\\}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <u>具有“</u>相同的<u>”元素个数。</u></blockquote><p>现在我们来到了一个关键性的问题面前：两个置换之间是否可以进行复合？为了回答这个问题，我们再次回到之前所说的正方形的例子。首先非常显然的是我们现在处于初始状态的正方形逆时针绕中心旋转 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=90%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"90^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，然后在此基础上再逆时针绕中心旋转 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=180%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"180^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 就相当于直接从初始状态逆时针绕中心旋转 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=270%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"270^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  。<br/>另外一个不是十分明显的例子是：<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-90a620118733af9a2f9bcef9aaa9d551_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"772\" data-rawheight=\"562\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"772\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-90a620118733af9a2f9bcef9aaa9d551_r.jpg\"/><figcaption>图片2</figcaption></figure><p>即我们先将处于初始状态的正方形逆时针旋转 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=90%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"90^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，然后在此基础上再将其关于连结左上和右下顶点的对角线进行镜像，所得到的结果与直接对处于初始状态的正方形关于竖直对称轴镜像的结果是一致的。图片2中的中的复合 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccirc\" alt=\"\\circ\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 表示的是变换的复合，也就是说“将处于初始状态的正方形逆时针旋转 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=90%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"90^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，然后在此基础上再将其关于连结左上和右下顶点的对角线进行镜像”是一个<b><i>复合变换 </i></b>，其效果与单次变换“将处于初始状态的正方形关于竖直对称轴镜像”的结果是一致的。<br/>同样我们发现，使用文字来描述这个复合变换是在是非常的繁琐。既然我们之前已经使用数字去表示置换了，那我们现在就使用这些数字去表示复合变换，即表示置换的复合。对于置换的复合，我们仍然使用符号 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccirc\" alt=\"\\circ\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。<br/>由之前所述我们知道，“将处于初始状态的正方形逆时针旋转 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=90%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"90^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ”这个变换的数字表述为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma%3D+%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%5C%5C+2+%26+3+%26+4+%26+1++%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B4.1.18%7D\" alt=\"\\sigma= \\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 \\\\ 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 &amp; 1  \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{4.1.18}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>而“将处于初始状态的正方形关于连结左上和右下顶点的对角线进行镜像”这个变换的数字表述为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ctau%3D+%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%5C%5C+1+%26+4+%26+3+%26+2++%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B4.1.19%7D\" alt=\"\\tau= \\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 \\\\ 1 &amp; 4 &amp; 3 &amp; 2  \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{4.1.19}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>最后，“将处于初始状态的正方形关于竖直对称轴镜像”这个变换的数字表述为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%5C%5C+2+%26+1+%26+4+%26+3++%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B4.1.20%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 \\\\ 2 &amp; 1 &amp; 4 &amp; 3  \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{4.1.20}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>于是，根据刚刚对复合变换的文字描述，我们有：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma%5Ccirc%5Ctau%3D%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%5C%5C+2+%26+3+%26+4+%26+1++%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D%5Ccirc%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%5C%5C+1+%26+4+%26+3+%26+2++%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D%3D+%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%5C%5C+2+%26+1+%26+4+%26+3++%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B4.1.21%7D\" alt=\"\\sigma\\circ\\tau=\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 \\\\ 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 &amp; 1  \\end{pmatrix}\\circ\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 \\\\ 1 &amp; 4 &amp; 3 &amp; 2  \\end{pmatrix}= \\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 \\\\ 2 &amp; 1 &amp; 4 &amp; 3  \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{4.1.21}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>对于这一点我们可以来验证一下。</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Balign%2A%7D+%26%28%5Csigma%5Ccirc%5Ctau%29%281%29%3D%5Csigma%28%5Ctau%281%29%29%3D%5Csigma%281%29%3D2%2C%5C%5C+%26%28%5Csigma%5Ccirc%5Ctau%29%282%29%3D%5Csigma%28%5Ctau%282%29%29%3D%5Csigma%284%29%3D1%2C%5C%5C+%26%28%5Csigma%5Ccirc%5Ctau%29%283%29%3D%5Csigma%28%5Ctau%283%29%29%3D%5Csigma%283%29%3D4%2C%5C%5C+%26%28%5Csigma%5Ccirc%5Ctau%29%284%29%3D%5Csigma%28%5Ctau%284%29%29%3D%5Csigma%282%29%3D3.+%5Cend%7Balign%2A%7D%5Ctag%7B4.1.22%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{align*} &amp;(\\sigma\\circ\\tau)(1)=\\sigma(\\tau(1))=\\sigma(1)=2,\\\\ &amp;(\\sigma\\circ\\tau)(2)=\\sigma(\\tau(2))=\\sigma(4)=1,\\\\ &amp;(\\sigma\\circ\\tau)(3)=\\sigma(\\tau(3))=\\sigma(3)=4,\\\\ &amp;(\\sigma\\circ\\tau)(4)=\\sigma(\\tau(4))=\\sigma(2)=3. \\end{align*}\\tag{4.1.22}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>显然，我们是对的！<br/>通过这个直观的例子我们可以明白一个十分重要的问题：<b><i>置换之间是可以进行复合的，且复合之后的可以得到一个“新的”置换。并且从初始状态通过复合置换得到的结果与从初始状态直接通过这个“新的”置换得到的结果必然是一致的 </i></b>。而且如果你愿意的话，你甚至可以将多个置换进行复合。<br/><br/><br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%7B%5Cbm%7B4.2%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large{\\bm{4.2}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b>置换群</b><br/>现在我们已经认识了群、群同态以及置换的概念了。下面我们来介绍 <b><i>置换群 </i></b>。置换群中的元素是一个非空集合 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=M\" alt=\"M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 上的置换。一个具体的例子就是我们刚才所举的集合 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5C%7B1%2C2%2C3%2C4%5C%7D\" alt=\"\\{1,2,3,4\\}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 上的置换 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5C%7B1%2C2%2C3%2C4%5C%7D\" alt=\"\\{1,2,3,4\\}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。那么现在就产生了几个基本的问题：<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bi%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{i).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 置换群中的运算是什么？<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{ii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 置换群中的单位元素是什么？<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{iii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 置换群中各个元素的逆元是什么？<br/>这些基本的问题都是关于群的定义的问题。下面我们还是来一一解答一下。<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bi%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{i).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 首先是置换群中的运算。置换群中的运算就是我们之前所提到的两个置换之间的复合运算 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccirc\" alt=\"\\circ\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。容易验证该运算是满足结合律的，且非空集合 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=M\" alt=\"M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 上的置换所构成的集合对该运算是封闭的。<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{ii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 置换群中的单位元素我们记作 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathrm%7B%7BId%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\mathrm{{Id}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。之前正方形置换的例子中，“什么也不做”这一变换就是正方形置换的置换群中的单位元素。<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{iii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 置换群中的元素 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的逆元我们记作 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma%5E%7B-1%7D\" alt=\"\\sigma^{-1}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，因为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma%5Ccirc%5Csigma%5E%7B-1%7D%3D%5Csigma%5E%7B-1%7D%5Ccirc%5Csigma%3D%5Cmathrm%7BId%7D.%5Ctag%7B4.2.1%7D\" alt=\"\\sigma\\circ\\sigma^{-1}=\\sigma^{-1}\\circ\\sigma=\\mathrm{Id}.\\tag{4.2.1}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>一个直观的例子是：设变换 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 为将正方形逆时针绕中心旋转 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=90%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"90^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，则 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma%5E%7B-1%7D\" alt=\"\\sigma^{-1}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 表示的就是将正方形顺时针绕中心旋转 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=90%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"90^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，那两个变换的复合变换 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma%5Ccirc%5Csigma%5E%7B-1%7D\" alt=\"\\sigma\\circ\\sigma^{-1}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 就是将正方形先绕中心逆时针旋转 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=90%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"90^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，然后再将正方形绕中心顺时针旋转 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=90%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"90^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，那么最后的结果与“什么也不做”(即  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathrm%7BId%7D\" alt=\"\\mathrm{Id}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> )这一变换是一样的。<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Cbm%7B%5Cmathrm%7BRemark%3A%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\bm{\\mathrm{Remark:}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 置换 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csigma\" alt=\"\\sigma\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的逆是存在的，因为我们之前说过，置换是一个双射。<br/>一个以集合 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=M\" alt=\"M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 上的全部置换为元素的群我们称为 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=M\" alt=\"M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的 <b><i>对称群 </i></b>，并记作 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathrm%7BSym%7D%28M%29\" alt=\"\\mathrm{Sym}(M)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。但集合 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=M\" alt=\"M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 具有 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=n\" alt=\"n\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 则元素时， <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=M\" alt=\"M\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的对称群可以记作 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=S_n\" alt=\"S_n\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，称为 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=n\" alt=\"n\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 次对称群。现在我们在这篇文章中所需要的知识已经全部学完了。群论是一个非常庞大的知识体系，我这里也仅仅是为了写这篇科普文章才简单的介绍了一下群的一些基本概念。其他更深的知识就请对群论感兴趣的朋友自行探索吧。</p><h2><br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5CLarge%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7B5.%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\Large\\bm{\\rm{5.}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b>站在群的角度上来理解代数运算</b></h2><p>在本节中，我们将要“忘记”我们熟知的基本的代数运算加法和乘法。我们会将数字理解为一些作用，通过这些作用可以将原来的数字变成新的数字。在定义后面的这些作用的时候我们会 <b><i>仿照定义置换时所使用的那种括号的形式 </i></b>。</p><p><br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%7B%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7B5.1%7D%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large{\\bm{\\rm{5.1}}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b>整数的滑动与实数的滑动</b><br/>首先我们来定义滑动的概念。为了进一步的讨论和方便大家的理解，我们就将滑动的概念定义在整数集上。我们这里将要仿照置换的定义对滑动进行定义。首先我们还是来看直观的例子。<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0a09412a43e8bc2da23017e443270bfd_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"494\" data-rawheight=\"140\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"494\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0a09412a43e8bc2da23017e443270bfd_r.jpg\"/><figcaption>图片3</figcaption></figure><p>如图片 3 所示，为了保证直观性，我们定义了所谓的“整数轴”，整数轴只在具体的整数处为点，其余各处均为虚线。现在我们对整数轴做一个向右滑动的动作，这个动作使整个整数轴向右滑动了一个单位。特别的，如果我们只观察数字 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0\" alt=\"0\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的话，我们发现它通过这种滑动滑到了原来数字 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的位置上。这样一个滑动作用使我们有了以下的对应关系：<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Barray%7D%7Br%7D++%5Cldots%5C%5C++-4%5Cto+-3%5C%5C++-3%5Cto+-2%5C%5C++-2%5Cto+-1%5C%5C++-1%5Cto+0%5C%5C++0%5Cto+1%5C%5C++1%5Cto+2%5C%5C++2%5Cto+3%5C%5C++%5Cldots+%5Cend%7Barray%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.1.1%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{array}{r}  \\ldots\\\\  -4\\to -3\\\\  -3\\to -2\\\\  -2\\to -1\\\\  -1\\to 0\\\\  0\\to 1\\\\  1\\to 2\\\\  2\\to 3\\\\  \\ldots \\end{array}.\\tag{5.1.1}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>显然，上述的对应关系蕴含了一种映射关系，我们将这个映射记为 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，则：<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Barray%7D%7Br%7D++%5Cldots%5C%5C++-4%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%28-4%29%3D-3%5C%5C++-3%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%28-3%29%3D-2%5C%5C++-2%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%28-2%29%3D-1%5C%5C++-1%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%28-1%29%3D0%5C%5C++0%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%280%29%3D1%5C%5C++1%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%281%29%3D2%5C%5C++2%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%282%29%3D3%5C%5C++%5Cldots+%5Cend%7Barray%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.1.2%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{array}{r}  \\ldots\\\\  -4\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}(-4)=-3\\\\  -3\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}(-3)=-2\\\\  -2\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}(-2)=-1\\\\  -1\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}(-1)=0\\\\  0\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}(0)=1\\\\  1\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}(1)=2\\\\  2\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}(2)=3\\\\  \\ldots \\end{array}.\\tag{5.1.2}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>虽然整数集是一个可数无穷集，但是我们依然可以 <b><i>借助 </i></b>置换那里的记号，将上述映射关系写在一个括号中，即：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%3A%3D%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+%5Cldots+%26+-4+%26+-3+%26+-2+%26+-1+%26+0+%26+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26%5Cldots+%5C%5C+%5Cldots+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%28-4%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%28-3%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%28-2%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%28-1%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%280%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%281%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%282%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%283%29+%26+%5Cldots++%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.1.3%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}:=\\begin{pmatrix} \\ldots &amp; -4 &amp; -3 &amp; -2 &amp; -1 &amp; 0 &amp; 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp;\\ldots \\\\ \\ldots &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}(-4) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}(-3) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}(-2) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}(-1) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}(0) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}(1) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}(2) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}(3) &amp; \\ldots  \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{5.1.3}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>这样我们就可以定义 <b><i>整数集上的一个向右的滑动 </i></b>为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+i%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamond%7D+j%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.1.4%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{v}:\\mathbb{Z}\\to\\mathbb{Z},\\quad i\\mapsto i\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\diamond} j,\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{Z}.\\tag{5.1.4}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><b><i>整数集上的一个向左的滑动为 </i></b>：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bv%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+i%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamond%7D+j%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BZ%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.1.5%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{v}:\\mathbb{Z}\\to\\mathbb{Z},\\quad i\\mapsto i\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\diamond} j,\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{Z}.\\tag{5.1.5}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>下面通过几个例子说明几个问题。<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bi%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{i).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 比如先将整数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 向右滑动 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3\" alt=\"3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 个单位，即 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamond%7D+3\" alt=\"1\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\diamond} 3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，得到结果 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=4\" alt=\"4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 然后再将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=4\" alt=\"4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 向左滑动 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=5\" alt=\"5\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 个为单位，即 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=4%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamond%7D+5\" alt=\"4\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\diamond} 5\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，得到结果 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-1\" alt=\"-1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，这与直接将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 向左滑动两个单位，即 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamond%7D+2\" alt=\"1\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\diamond} 2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 得到的结果是一样的。这说明了 <b><i>整数的滑动是可以复合的 </i></b>。<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{ii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 将任意一个整数滑动任意一个固定的整数单位 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=j\" alt=\"j\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 所得到的结果都是唯一的，这说明了整数的滑动是可逆的(即双射的)。并且具体的，将整数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 向右滑动 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3\" alt=\"3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 个单位，即 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamond%7D+3\" alt=\"1\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\diamond} 3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，得到结果 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=4\" alt=\"4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 然后再将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=4\" alt=\"4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 向左滑动 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3\" alt=\"3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 个为单位，即 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=4%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamond%7D+3\" alt=\"4\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\diamond} 3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，结果又回到了 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。这说明了对 <b><i>任意一个固定的整数单位</i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbm%7Bj%7D\" alt=\"\\bm{j}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>，左滑动与右滑动互为逆元 </i></b>。且对任意一个固定整数单位 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=j\" alt=\"j\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  的左滑动与右滑动的复合为 <b><i>单位元 </i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbm%7B%5Cmathrm%7BId%7D_V%7D\" alt=\"\\bm{\\mathrm{Id}_V}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，表示“不做滑动”。<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{iii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 显然，整数的任意两个滑动的复合还是一个整数的滑动。<b><i>即定义在整数集上的滑动对复合运算</i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccirc\" alt=\"\\circ\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>是封闭的</i></b>。<br/>有了整数的滑动以后我们就可以仿照它来定义实数的滑动了。<b><i>实数的一个向右的滑动 </i></b>定义为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5C%2C+j%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.1.6%7D\" alt=\" \\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}:\\mathbb{R}\\to\\mathbb{R},\\quad i\\mapsto i\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\diamondsuit}\\, j,\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{R}.\\tag{5.1.6}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><b><i>实数的一个向左的滑动为 </i></b>：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5C%2C+j%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.1.7%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{u}:\\mathbb{R}\\to\\mathbb{R},\\quad i\\mapsto i\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\diamondsuit}\\, j,\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{R}.\\tag{5.1.7}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>同理，我们可以说明实数的滑动也是：<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bi%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{i).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  可以复合的。<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{ii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 双射的，且具有逆元和单位元。<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biii%7D%29.\" alt=\"\\rm{iii}).\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 对复合是封闭的。<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccolor%7Bdarkorange%7D%7B%5Clarge%7B%5Cbm%7B%5Crm+%7BExercise%5Cquad+5.1.1%3A%7D%7D%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\color{darkorange}{\\large{\\bm{\\rm {Exercise\\quad 5.1.1:}}}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>请大家自行验证以上三条，对内容的理解会有一定帮助。<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Ccolor%7Bdarkorange%7D%7B%5Cblacksquare%7D+\" alt=\"\\large\\color{darkorange}{\\blacksquare} \" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%7B%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7B5.2%7D%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large{\\bm{\\rm{5.2}}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b>非零有理数与非零实数的伸缩</b><br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%7B%5Cbm%7B5.2.1%7D%7D\" alt=\"{\\bm{5.2.1}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b>正有理数与负有理数的伸缩</b><br/>作为引入，首先我们先来考察正有理数集 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D\" alt=\"\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。我们先来定义正有理数集上的伸缩。<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5eb5f45a0b9a869800a324c500fbf12c_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"484\" data-rawheight=\"152\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"484\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5eb5f45a0b9a869800a324c500fbf12c_r.jpg\"/><figcaption>图片4</figcaption></figure><p>如图片 4 所示，我们这里又定义了一个“正有理数轴”(正有理数轴的虚线比整数轴稍微密了一点，这只是为了做一下区分)。现在我们对这个正有理数轴做一个拉长的动作，这个动作将整个正有理数轴拉长为原来的两倍(这就意味着做正有理数轴上的每一个点都被“拉长为”原来的两倍)。如果我们只观察正有理数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的话，我们会发现它通过这种拉长的作用变为的原来的正有理数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2\" alt=\"2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。因此对于这样一个拉长的作用我们有以下对应关系：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Barray%7D%7Bl%7D+1%5Cto+2%5C%5C+2%5Cto+4%5C%5C+3%5Cto+6%5C%5C+4%5Cto+8%5C%5C+5%5Cto+10%5C%5C+6%5Cto+12%5C%5C+%5Cldots+%5Cend%7Barray%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.1.1%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{array}{l} 1\\to 2\\\\ 2\\to 4\\\\ 3\\to 6\\\\ 4\\to 8\\\\ 5\\to 10\\\\ 6\\to 12\\\\ \\ldots \\end{array}.\\tag{5.2.1.1}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>显然，上述的对应关系也蕴含了一种映射关系，我们将这个映射记为 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，则：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Barray%7D%7Bl%7D+1%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%281%29%3D2%5C%5C+2%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%282%29%3D4%5C%5C+3%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%283%29%3D6%5C%5C+4%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%284%29%3D8%5C%5C+5%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%285%29%3D10%5C%5C+6%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%286%29%3D12%5C%5C+%5Cldots+%5Cend%7Barray%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.1.2%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{array}{l} 1\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(1)=2\\\\ 2\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(2)=4\\\\ 3\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(3)=6\\\\ 4\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(4)=8\\\\ 5\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(5)=10\\\\ 6\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(6)=12\\\\ \\ldots \\end{array}.\\tag{5.2.1.2}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>我们依然仿照置换中的记号，将上面的对应的关系写为括号的形式：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%3D%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%26+5+%26+6+%26%5Cldots+%5C%5C+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%281%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%282%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%283%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%284%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%285%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%286%29+%26+%5Cldots+%5C%5C+%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D%5Ctag%7B5.2.1.3%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}=\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 &amp; 5 &amp; 6 &amp;\\ldots \\\\ \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(1) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(2) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(3) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(4) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(5) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(6) &amp; \\ldots \\\\ \\end{pmatrix}\\tag{5.2.1.3}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>这样我们就可以定义 <b><i>正有理数集上的一个拉长 </i></b>为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C+j%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.1.4%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}:\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0}\\to\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0},\\quad i\\mapsto i\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{+}}\\, j,\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0}.\\tag{5.2.1.4}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>同理可定义 <b><i>正有理数集上的一个收缩 </i></b>为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%3D%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%26+5+%26+6+%26%5Cldots+%5C%5C+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%281%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%282%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%283%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%284%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%285%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%286%29+%26+%5Cldots+%5C%5C+%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D%5Ctag%7B5.2.1.3%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}=\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 &amp; 5 &amp; 6 &amp;\\ldots \\\\ \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(1) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(2) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(3) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(4) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(5) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{+}}(6) &amp; \\ldots \\\\ \\end{pmatrix}\\tag{5.2.1.3}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>下面我们依然通过几个例子说明几个问题。<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bi%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{i).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 比如先将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 拉长 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3\" alt=\"3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 个单位，即 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C+3\" alt=\"1\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{+}}\\, 3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，得到结果 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3\" alt=\"3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，然后再将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3\" alt=\"3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 收缩 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=6\" alt=\"6\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 个为单位，即 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C+6\" alt=\"3\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\lozenge^{+}}\\, 6\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，得到结果 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cfrac%7B1%7D%7B2%7D\" alt=\"\\frac{1}{2}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，这与直接将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 收缩两个单位，即 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C+2\" alt=\"1\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\lozenge^{+}}\\, 2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 得到的结果是一样的。这说明了 <b><i>正有理数的伸缩是可以复合的 </i></b>。<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-067ca05ed4aa066b3b87708dc76f5bdb_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"501\" data-rawheight=\"296\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"501\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-067ca05ed4aa066b3b87708dc76f5bdb_r.jpg\"/><figcaption>图片5：正有理数的伸缩复合示例。</figcaption></figure><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{ii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 将任意一个正有理数拉长 (或收缩) 任意一个固定的 <b><i>正有理数单位 </i></b><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=j\" alt=\"j\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 所得到的结果都是唯一的，这说明了正有理数拉长 (或收缩)是可逆的(即双射的)。并且具体的，先将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 拉长 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3\" alt=\"3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 个单位，即 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C+3\" alt=\"1\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{+}}\\, 3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，得到结果 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3\" alt=\"3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，然后再将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3\" alt=\"3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 收缩 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3\" alt=\"3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 个为单位，即 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C+3\" alt=\"3\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\lozenge^{+}}\\, 3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，结果又回到了 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。这说明了对 <b><i>任意一个固定的正有理数单位</i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbm%7Bj%7D\" alt=\"\\bm{j}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>，拉长与收缩互为逆元 </i></b>。且对任意一个固定整数单位 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=j\" alt=\"j\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  的拉长与收缩的复合为 <b><i>单位元 </i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbm%7B%5Cmathrm%7BId%7D_S%7D\" alt=\"\\bm{\\mathrm{Id}_S}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，表示“不做伸缩”。<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{iii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 显然，正有理数的任意两个伸缩的复合还是一个正有理数的伸缩。<b><i>即定义在正有理数集上的伸缩对复合运算</i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccirc\" alt=\"\\circ\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>是封闭的</i></b>。<br/>有了正有理数的伸缩作为引入之后，我们再来看看负有理数集 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D\" alt=\"\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 上的伸缩。<br/>为了方便说明，我们再来定义一个“负有理数轴”。这里我们同样将负有理数轴拉长到原来的两倍(这就意味着做负有理数轴上的每一个点都被“拉长为”原来的两倍)。如果我们只观察负有理数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的话，我们会发现它通过这种拉长的作用变为的原来的负有理数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-2\" alt=\"-2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。因此对于这样一个拉长的作用我们有以下对应关系：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Barray%7D%7Bl%7D+-1%5Cto+-2%5C%5C+-2%5Cto+-4%5C%5C+-3%5Cto+-6%5C%5C+-4%5Cto+-8%5C%5C+-5%5Cto+-10%5C%5C+-6%5Cto+-12%5C%5C+%5Cldots+%5Cend%7Barray%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.1.6%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{array}{l} -1\\to -2\\\\ -2\\to -4\\\\ -3\\to -6\\\\ -4\\to -8\\\\ -5\\to -10\\\\ -6\\to -12\\\\ \\ldots \\end{array}.\\tag{5.2.1.6}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>显然，上述的对应关系也蕴含了一种映射关系，我们将这个映射记为 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，则：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Barray%7D%7Bl%7D+-1%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%281%29%3D-2%5C%5C+-2%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%282%29%3D-4%5C%5C+-3%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%283%29%3D-6%5C%5C+-4%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%284%29%3D-8%5C%5C+-5%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%285%29%3D-10%5C%5C+-6%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%286%29%3D-12%5C%5C+%5Cldots+%5Cend%7Barray%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.1.7%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{array}{l} -1\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(1)=-2\\\\ -2\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(2)=-4\\\\ -3\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(3)=-6\\\\ -4\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(4)=-8\\\\ -5\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(5)=-10\\\\ -6\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(6)=-12\\\\ \\ldots \\end{array}.\\tag{5.2.1.7}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>我们依然仿照置换中的记号，将上面的对应的关系写为括号的形式：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%3D%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%26+5+%26+6+%26%5Cldots+%5C%5C+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%281%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%282%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%283%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%284%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%285%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%286%29+%26+%5Cldots+%5C%5C+%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.1.8%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}=\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 &amp; 5 &amp; 6 &amp;\\ldots \\\\ \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(1) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(2) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(3) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(4) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(5) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(6) &amp; \\ldots \\\\ \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{5.2.1.8}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>这样我们就可以定义 <b><i>负有理数集上的一个拉长</i></b> 为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%3D%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+4+%26+5+%26+6+%26%5Cldots+%5C%5C+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%281%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%282%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%283%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%284%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%285%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%286%29+%26+%5Cldots+%5C%5C+%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.1.8%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}=\\begin{pmatrix} 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; 4 &amp; 5 &amp; 6 &amp;\\ldots \\\\ \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(1) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(2) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(3) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(4) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(5) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{s^{-}}(6) &amp; \\ldots \\\\ \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{5.2.1.8}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>同理可定义 <b><i>负有理数集上的一个收缩</i></b> 为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bs%5E%7B-%7D%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C+j%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.1.10%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{s^{-}}:\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0}\\to\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0},\\quad i\\mapsto i\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\, j,\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0}.\\tag{5.2.1.10}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>并且，负有理数的伸缩与正有理数的伸缩的性质 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm+i%29%5Csim%5Crm%7Biii%29%7D\" alt=\"\\rm i)\\sim\\rm{iii)}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 是类似的。留做练习，请大家自行说明。</p><p><br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%7B%5Cbm%7B5.2.2%7D%7D\" alt=\"{\\bm{5.2.2}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b>非零有理数的纯镜像以及其负有理数倍伸缩</b><br/>刚才我们定义的伸缩中都有。 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=j%3E0\" alt=\"j&gt;0\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 那么现在问题来了，如果我非要定义一个<b><i>负有理数倍的伸缩 </i></b>(即 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=j%3C0\" alt=\"j&lt;0\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ) 那怎么办呢？这里我们可以不直接对这个负有理数倍的伸缩做定义，我们先来定义一个叫 <b><i>非零有理数的纯镜像</i></b> 的概念。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-eb6d68e07d1000dc45b0891724f0b53b_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"485\" data-rawheight=\"170\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"485\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-eb6d68e07d1000dc45b0891724f0b53b_r.jpg\"/><figcaption>图片6</figcaption></figure><p>为了定义这个纯镜像的概念，如图片 6 所示，我们首先在正有理数轴上固定一个点 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=i\" alt=\"i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，然后我们在有理数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0\" alt=\"0\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 处放上一面镜子(平面镜)，则会在负有理数轴上出现一个点 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%7D%5C%2Ci\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup}\\,i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，这个点与有理数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0\" alt=\"0\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 之间的距离也为 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=i\" alt=\"i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，我们就把 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2Ci\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\,i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 称为正有理数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=i\" alt=\"i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的 <b><i>负镜像点 </i></b>。同理，对于每个负有理数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=j\" alt=\"j\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，我们将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2Cj\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\,j\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 称为负有理数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=j\" alt=\"j\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  的 <b><i>正镜像点 </i></b>。</p><blockquote>举两个例子：<br/> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C5%3D-5%2C%5Cquad+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%28-2%29%3D2.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.1%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\,5=-5,\\quad \\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\,(-2)=2.\\tag{5.2.2.1}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </blockquote><p>现在我们可以定义非零有理数的镜像的概念了。我们定义<b><i> 正有理数的纯负镜像</i></b> 为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bm%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2Ci.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.2%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{m^{+}}:\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0}\\to\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0},\\quad i\\mapsto\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\,i.\\tag{5.2.2.2}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>定义 <b><i> 负有理数的纯正镜像</i></b> 为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bm%5E%7B-%7D%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2Ci.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.3%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{m^{-}}:\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0}\\to\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0},\\quad i\\mapsto\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\,i.\\tag{5.2.2.3}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bm%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Ccirc%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bm%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cright%29%3D+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bm%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Ccirc%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bm%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cright%29%3D%5Cmathrm%7BId%7D_M.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.4%7D\" alt=\"\\left(\\underset{\\leftarrow}{m^{+}}\\circ\\underset{\\rightarrow}{m^{-}}\\right)= \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{m^{-}}\\circ\\underset{\\leftarrow}{m^{+}}\\right)=\\mathrm{Id}_M.\\tag{5.2.2.4}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>有了非零有理数的纯镜像的概念之后我们就可以定义所谓的负数倍的伸缩了。定义 <b><i>正有理数的负有理数倍拉长</i></b> 为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2Cj%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.5%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\beta^{+\\to-}}:\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0}\\to\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0},\\quad i\\mapsto \\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{+}}\\, \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\,j\\right)\\right),\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0}.\\tag{5.2.2.5}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>定义 <b><i>正有理数的负有理数倍收缩 </i></b>为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2Cj%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.6%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\beta^{+\\to-}}:\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0}\\to\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0},\\quad i\\mapsto \\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\lozenge^{+}}\\, \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\,j\\right)\\right),\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0}.\\tag{5.2.2.6}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>定义 <b><i>负有理数的负有理数倍拉长</i></b> 为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2Cj%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.7%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to+}}:\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0}\\to\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0},\\quad i\\mapsto \\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,\\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\,j\\right)\\right),\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0}.\\tag{5.2.2.7}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>定义 <b><i>负有理数的负有理数倍收缩</i></b> 为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2Cj%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.8%7D\" alt=\" \\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to+}}:\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0}\\to\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0},\\quad i\\mapsto \\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,\\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\,j\\right)\\right),\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0}.\\tag{5.2.2.8}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><blockquote>举两个例子，比如将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2\" alt=\"2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 拉长 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-3\" alt=\"-3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 倍，即：  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cleft%282%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%28-3%29%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cleft%282%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C+3%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D6%3D-6%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.9%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\left(2\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{+}}\\, \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\,(-3)\\right)\\right)=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\left(2\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{+}}\\, 3\\right)=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}6=-6\\tag{5.2.2.9}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-4\" alt=\"-4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 收缩 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-2\" alt=\"-2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 倍，即：  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28%28-4%29%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%28-2%29%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28%28-4%29%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C2%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%28-2%29%3D2.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.10%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left((-4)\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,\\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\,(-2)\\right)\\right)=\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left((-4)\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,2\\right)=\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}(-2)=2.\\tag{5.2.2.10}\"
