eeimg=\"1\"/> </blockquote><p>现在为了统一符号，我们将要舍弃我们之前的正有理数的正有理数倍伸缩与负有理数的正有理数倍伸缩的定义，并通过一个新的概念—— <b><i>纯虚镜像 </i></b>，给出两者的等价定义。首先我们来定义纯虚镜像。<br/>定义 <b><i>正有理数的纯正虚镜像</i></b> 为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bm%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2Ci%3Di.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.11%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{m^{+}}:\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0}\\to\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0},\\quad i\\mapsto\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\,i=i.\\tag{5.2.2.11}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>定义 <b><i>负有理数的纯负虚镜像</i></b> 为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bm%5E%7B-%7D%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2Ci%3Di.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.12%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{m^{-}}:\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0}\\to\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0},\\quad i\\mapsto\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\,i=i.\\tag{5.2.2.12}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><blockquote>举两个例子：<br/> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C5%3D5%2C%5Cquad+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%28-2%29%3D-2%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.13%7D\" alt=\"{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\,5=5,\\quad \\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\,(-2)=-2\\tag{5.2.2.13}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </blockquote><p>有了纯虚镜像的定义之后，我们就可以将非零有理数的正有理数倍伸缩进行等价地定义了。我们将 <b><i>正有理数的正有理数倍拉长 </i></b>等价地定义为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2Cj%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.14%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\beta^{+\\to+}}:\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0}\\to\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0},\\quad i\\mapsto \\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{+}}\\, \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\,j\\right)\\right),\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0}.\\tag{5.2.2.14}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>将 <b><i>正有理数的正有理数倍收缩 </i></b>等价地定义为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2Cj%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.15%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\beta^{+\\to+}}:\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0}\\to\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0},\\quad i\\mapsto \\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\lozenge^{+}}\\,\\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\,j\\right)\\right),\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0}.\\tag{5.2.2.15}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>将 <b><i>负有理数的正有理数倍拉长</i></b> 等价地定义为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2Cj%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.16%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to-}}:\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0}\\to\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0},\\quad i\\mapsto \\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,\\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\,j\\right)\\right),\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0}.\\tag{5.2.2.16}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>将 <b><i>负有理数的正有理数倍收缩</i></b> 等价地定义为:</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3C0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2Cj%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%3E0%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.17%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to-}}:\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0}\\to\\mathbb{Q}_{&lt;0},\\quad i\\mapsto \\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,\\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\,j\\right)\\right),\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{Q}_{&gt;0}.\\tag{5.2.2.17}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><blockquote>举两个例子，比如将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2\" alt=\"2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 拉长 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3\" alt=\"3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 倍，即：  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cleft%282%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C3%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cleft%282%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C+3%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D6%3D6.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.18%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\left(2\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{+}}\\, \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\,3\\right)\\right)=\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\left(2\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{+}}\\, 3\\right)=\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}6=6.\\tag{5.2.2.18}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-4\" alt=\"-4\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 收缩 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2\" alt=\"2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 倍，即：  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28%28-4%29%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C2%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28%28-4%29%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C2%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%28-2%29%3D-2.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.19%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left((-4)\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,\\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\,2\\right)\\right)=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left((-4)\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,2\\right)=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}(-2)=-2.\\tag{5.2.2.19}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </blockquote><p>显然，通过上面所举的例子我们发现，以上八种变换都是可逆的(即双射的)。<br/>最终我们可以将以上八种情况合并为种：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%7D%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%7D%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%7D%5C%2Cj%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BQ%7D_%7B%5Cne0%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.20%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta}:\\mathbb{Q}_{\\ne 0}\\to\\mathbb{Q}_{\\ne 0},\\quad i\\mapsto \\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup}\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\lozenge}\\, \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup}\\,j\\right)\\right),\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{Q}_{\\ne0}.\\tag{5.2.2.20}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>下面我们要来谈一谈 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的复合问题。我们通过一个例子来说明<img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的复合问题。我们先将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-1\" alt=\"-1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 拉长 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2\" alt=\"2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 倍(负有理数的正有理数倍拉长)，即：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28%28-1%29%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C2%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28%28-1%29%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C2%5Cright%29.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.21%7D%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28-2%5Cright%29%3D-2.\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left((-1)\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,\\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\,2\\right)\\right)=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left((-1)\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,2\\right).\\tag{5.2.2.21}=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left(-2\\right)=-2.\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>得到结果 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-2\" alt=\"-2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，然后我们再将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-2\" alt=\"-2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 拉长 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-3\" alt=\"-3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 倍(负有理数的负有理数倍拉长)，即：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28%28-2%29%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%28-3%29%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28%28-2%29%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C3%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%28-6%29%3D6.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.22%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left((-2)\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,\\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\,(-3)\\right)\\right)=\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left((-2)\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,3\\right)=\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}(-6)=6.\\tag{5.2.2.22}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>这就说明了负有理数的负有理数倍拉长是可以复合负有理数的正有理数倍拉长的，更一般的，负有理数的负有理数倍伸缩可以复合负有理数的正有理数倍伸缩。<br/>但是比如第一次做的伸缩是负有理数的正有理数倍伸缩，那么根据定义，此时的结果是负有理数，所以就 <b><i>不能对此结果再做 </i></b>正有理数的伸缩操作了。这就说明了：<b><i>正有理数的伸缩不能与负有理数的正有理数倍伸缩复合</i></b>。但是正有理数的伸缩可以与负有理数的负有理数倍伸缩复合，这是因为负有理数的负有理数倍伸缩的结果是正有理数。<br/>经过以上的分析我们发现：<img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的复合可分为 <b><i>有效复合 </i></b>与 <b><i>无效复合 </i></b>两种情况。所谓有效复合，指的就是例如负有理数的负有理数倍伸缩与负有理数的正有理数倍伸缩的复合，且：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%5Ccirc%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto%2B%7D%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.23%7D\" alt=\"\\left(\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to+}}\\circ\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to-}}\\right)=\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to+}}.\\tag{5.2.2.23}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>而所谓无效复合，指的就是例如正有理数的正有理数倍伸缩不能与负有理数的正有理数倍伸缩复合，并且对于无效复合，我们定义复合的结果为第一次伸缩变换的结果，即例如：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%5Ccirc%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D%5Cright%29%3A%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.24%7D\" alt=\"\\left(\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta^{+\\to+}}\\circ\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to-}}\\right):=\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to-}}.\\tag{5.2.2.24}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>定义有效复合与无效复合的原因是为了保证八种 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的两两复合对复合运算都是封闭的。因为从有效复合与无效复合的定义来看，两者的结果都仍是八种 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 中的某一种。</p><blockquote><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Cbm%7B%5Cmathrm%7BRemark%3A%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\bm{\\mathrm{Remark:}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>由于八种 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 都是双射的，所以他们的到达域等于值域，于是我们便可以将第一次伸缩变换的到达域下一次伸缩变换的定义域做一下比较，当两者相同时复合便是有效的，否则是无效的。</blockquote><p><br/>并且我们有：<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bi%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{i).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 有效复合的有效复合是有效的；<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{ii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 有效复合的无效复合是无效的；<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{iii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 无效复合的有效复合是有效的；<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biv%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{iv).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 无效复合的无效复合是无效的。</p><blockquote><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Cbm%7B%5Cmathrm%7BRemark%3A%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\bm{\\mathrm{Remark:}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>在原文中我对 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%7D\" alt=\" \\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的两两复合做了 <b><i>非常详细 </i></b>的讨论，<b><i>推荐大家去看一下原文或者视频 </i></b>。</blockquote><p>有关逆元，我们也通过一个例子来说明。<br/>我们先将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-1\" alt=\"-1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 拉长 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2\" alt=\"2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 倍(负有理数的正有理数倍拉长)，即：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28%28-1%29%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C2%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28%28-1%29%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C2%5Cright%29.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.25%7D%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28-2%5Cright%29%3D-2.\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left((-1)\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,\\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\,2\\right)\\right)=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left((-1)\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,2\\right).\\tag{5.2.2.25}=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left(-2\\right)=-2.\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>得到结果 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-2\" alt=\"-2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，然后我们再将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-2\" alt=\"-2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 收缩 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2\" alt=\"2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 倍(负有理数的正有理数倍收缩)，即：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28%28-2%29%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C2%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28%28-2%29%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Clozenge%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C2%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbigtriangleup%5E%7B-%7D%7D%28-1%29%3D-1.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.26%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left((-2)\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,\\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{+}}\\,2\\right)\\right)=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}\\left((-2)\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\lozenge^{-}}\\,2\\right)=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\bigtriangleup^{-}}(-1)=-1.\\tag{5.2.2.26}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>结果又回到了 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-1\" alt=\"-1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，这就说明了对于同一伸缩倍数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2\" alt=\"2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 而言，负有理数的正有理数倍拉长与负有理数的正有理数倍拉长互为逆元，两者复合的结果是单元元 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathrm%7BId%7D_%7BB%7D\" alt=\"\\mathrm{Id}_{B}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，表示“不进行伸缩”。</p><blockquote><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Cbm%7B%5Cmathrm%7BRemark%3A%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\bm{\\mathrm{Remark:}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>实际上，对于八种 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%7D++\" alt=\" \\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta}  \" eeimg=\"1\"/> ：  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.27%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\beta^{+\\to-}},\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\beta^{+\\to-}},\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\beta^{+\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\beta^{+\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to-}},\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to-}}.\\tag{5.2.2.27}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>它们的逆元都是唯一的，并且(从左到右)分别为：  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.28%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\beta^{+\\to-}},\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\beta^{+\\to-}},\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\beta^{+\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\beta^{+\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to-}},\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\beta^{-\\to-}}.\\tag{5.2.2.28}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </blockquote><p>对于非零实数而言，我们也可以定义它的伸缩为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%7D%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacklozenge%7D%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%7D%5C%2Cj%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne0%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.29%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma}:\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\to\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0},\\quad i\\mapsto \\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\blacktriangle}\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\blacklozenge}\\, \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacktriangle}\\,j\\right)\\right),\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne0}.\\tag{5.2.2.29}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>其中 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacklozenge%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\blacklozenge}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 表示非零实数的伸缩运算， <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\blacktriangle}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 表示非零实数的镜像(包括纯镜像和纯虚镜像)运算。与 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 一样，其也有八种情况：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B-%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B-%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.30%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\gamma^{+\\to-}},\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\gamma^{+\\to-}},\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\gamma^{-\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\gamma^{-\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\gamma^{+\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\gamma^{+\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\gamma^{-\\to-}},\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\gamma^{-\\to-}}.\\tag{5.2.2.30}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>并且上述的八种映射都是双射的，也就是说它都是具有逆的，它们的逆分别是(从左到右)：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B-%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B-%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.2.2.31%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\gamma^{-\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\gamma^{-\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\gamma^{+\\to-}},\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\gamma^{+\\to-}},\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\gamma^{+\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\gamma^{+\\to+}},\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\gamma^{-\\to-}},\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\gamma^{-\\to-}}.\\tag{5.2.2.31}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>并且这八种情况的复合也分有效复合与无效复合两种。且任意两个 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 对一般的复合运算 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccirc\" alt=\"\\circ\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 也是封闭的，且无效复合的无效复合还是无效的，无效复合的有效复合是有效的，有效复合的无效复合是无效的，有效复合的有效复合是有效的。<b><i>总之，</i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma}\" eeimg=\"1\"/><b><i> 与 </i></b><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cbeta%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\beta}\" eeimg=\"1\"/><b><i> 的运作方式以及基本性质都是十分相似的</i></b>。</p><p><br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge+%5Cbm%7B5.3%7D\" alt=\"\\large \\bm{5.3}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b>复数的滑动</b><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bd006cd19364e9fa0cedac4a5354feff_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"772\" data-rawheight=\"542\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"772\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bd006cd19364e9fa0cedac4a5354feff_r.jpg\"/><figcaption>图片7</figcaption></figure><p>如图 7 中的滑动是将原始的复平面沿复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=5%2B3%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"5+3\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 进行的滑动。它可以被视为在实轴上的 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=5\" alt=\"5\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 个单位的向右滑动(对应了实数的滑动)和虚轴上的 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3\" alt=\"3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 个单位的向上滑动的复合，如图 8 所示。<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e4ac67daf616d8603873e2dd7eafc5b8_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"772\" data-rawheight=\"516\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"772\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e4ac67daf616d8603873e2dd7eafc5b8_r.jpg\"/><figcaption>图片8</figcaption></figure><p>图片 8 中的 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cheartsuit\" alt=\"\\heartsuit\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 为一种运算，后面我们会看到它的定义。<br/>这样的分解可以让我们分别得到实轴与虚轴上的两个对应关系。首先是实轴上的对应关系：<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Barray%7D%7Br%7D+%5Cldots%5C%5C+-3%5Cto+2%5C%5C+-2%5Cto+3%5C%5C+-1%5Cto+4%5C%5C+0%5Cto+5%5C%5C+1%5Cto+6%5C%5C+2%5Cto+7%5C%5C+3%5Cto+8%5C%5C+%5Cldots+%5Cend%7Barray%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.1%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{array}{r} \\ldots\\\\ -3\\to 2\\\\ -2\\to 3\\\\ -1\\to 4\\\\ 0\\to 5\\\\ 1\\to 6\\\\ 2\\to 7\\\\ 3\\to 8\\\\ \\ldots \\end{array}.\\tag{5.3.1}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>利用之前定义的实数的向右滑动 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 我们可以得到：<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Barray%7D%7Br%7D+%5Cldots%5C%5C+-3%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%28-3%29%3D2%5C%5C+-2%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%28-2%29%3D3%5C%5C+-1%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%28-1%29%3D4%5C%5C+0%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%280%29%3D5%5C%5C+1%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%281%29%3D6%5C%5C+2%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%282%29%3D7%5C%5C+3%5Cto+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%283%29%3D8%5C%5C+%5Cldots+%5Cend%7Barray%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.2%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{array}{r} \\ldots\\\\ -3\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}(-3)=2\\\\ -2\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}(-2)=3\\\\ -1\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}(-1)=4\\\\ 0\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}(0)=5\\\\ 1\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}(1)=6\\\\ 2\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}(2)=7\\\\ 3\\to \\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}(3)=8\\\\ \\ldots \\end{array}.\\tag{5.3.2}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>然后我们就可以将实轴上的这种对应关系写为括号的形式了：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%3D+%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+%5Cldots+%26+-3+%26+-2+%26+-1+%26+0+%26+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+%5Cldots+%5C%5C+%5Cldots+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%28-3%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%28-2%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%28-1%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%280%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%281%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%282%29+%26+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%283%29+%26+%5Cldots+%5C%5C+%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.3%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}= \\begin{pmatrix} \\ldots &amp; -3 &amp; -2 &amp; -1 &amp; 0 &amp; 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; \\ldots \\\\ \\ldots &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}(-3) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}(-2) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}(-1) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}(0) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}(1) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}(2) &amp; \\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}(3) &amp; \\ldots \\\\ \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{5.3.3}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>下面我们再来看虚轴上的对应关系：<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Barray%7D%7Br%7D+%5Cldots%5C%5C+-3%5Ccdot+i%5Cto+0%5C%5C+-2%5Ccdot+i%5Cto+1%5Ccdot+i%5C%5C+-1%5Ccdot+i%5Cto+2%5Ccdot+i%5C%5C+0%5Cto+3%5Ccdot+i%5C%5C+1%5Ccdot+i%5Cto+4%5Ccdot+i%5C%5C+2%5Ccdot+i%5Cto+5%5Ccdot+i%5C%5C+3%5Ccdot+i%5Cto+6%5Ccdot+i%5C%5C+%5Cldots+%5Cend%7Barray%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.4%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{array}{r} \\ldots\\\\ -3\\cdot i\\to 0\\\\ -2\\cdot i\\to 1\\cdot i\\\\ -1\\cdot i\\to 2\\cdot i\\\\ 0\\to 3\\cdot i\\\\ 1\\cdot i\\to 4\\cdot i\\\\ 2\\cdot i\\to 5\\cdot i\\\\ 3\\cdot i\\to 6\\cdot i\\\\ \\ldots \\end{array}.\\tag{5.3.4}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>我们发现，如果我们只考察虚部的话，那么这种对应关系也可以被视为是实轴上的滑动。我们将这种 <b><i>只看虚部的向上滑动 </i></b>定义为 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmu%5Cuparrow\" alt=\"\\mu\\uparrow\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。于是我们有：<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Barray%7D%7Br%7D+%5Cldots%5C%5C+-3%5Cto+%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%28-3%29%3D0%5C%5C+-2%5Cto+%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%28-2%29%3D1%5C%5C+-1%5Cto+%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%28-1%29%3D2%5C%5C+0%5Cto+%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%280%29%3D3%5C%5C+1%5Cto+%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%281%29%3D4%5C%5C+2%5Cto+%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%282%29%3D5%5C%5C+3%5Cto+%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%283%29%3D6%5C%5C+%5Cldots+%5Cend%7Barray%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.5%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{array}{r} \\ldots\\\\ -3\\to \\mu\\uparrow(-3)=0\\\\ -2\\to \\mu\\uparrow(-2)=1\\\\ -1\\to \\mu\\uparrow(-1)=2\\\\ 0\\to \\mu\\uparrow(0)=3\\\\ 1\\to \\mu\\uparrow(1)=4\\\\ 2\\to \\mu\\uparrow(2)=5\\\\ 3\\to \\mu\\uparrow(3)=6\\\\ \\ldots \\end{array}.\\tag{5.3.5}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>写为括号的形式为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%3D+%5Cbegin%7Bpmatrix%7D+%5Cldots+%26+-3+%26+-2+%26+-1+%26+0+%26+1+%26+2+%26+3+%26+%5Cldots+%5C%5C+%5Cldots+%26+%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%28-3%29+%26+%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%28-2%29+%26+%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%28-1%29+%26+%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%280%29+%26+%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%281%29+%26+%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%282%29+%26+%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%283%29+%26+%5Cldots+%5C%5C+%5Cend%7Bpmatrix%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.6%7D\" alt=\"\\mu\\uparrow= \\begin{pmatrix} \\ldots &amp; -3 &amp; -2 &amp; -1 &amp; 0 &amp; 1 &amp; 2 &amp; 3 &amp; \\ldots \\\\ \\ldots &amp; \\mu\\uparrow(-3) &amp; \\mu\\uparrow(-2) &amp; \\mu\\uparrow(-1) &amp; \\mu\\uparrow(0) &amp; \\mu\\uparrow(1) &amp; \\mu\\uparrow(2) &amp; \\mu\\uparrow(3) &amp; \\ldots \\\\ \\end{pmatrix}.\\tag{5.3.6}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>这样我们就可以定义复数集上的一个 <b><i>右上滑动 </i></b>为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=w%5Cnearrow%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D%2C%5Cquad+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%2C%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%5Cright%29%5Cmapsto+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%5Cright%29.%5Ctag%7B5.3.7%7D\" alt=\"w\\nearrow:\\mathbb{R}\\times\\mathbb{R}\\to\\mathbb{C},\\quad \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{u},\\mu\\uparrow\\right)\\mapsto \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}\\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(\\mu\\uparrow\\right).\\tag{5.3.7}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>其中运算 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cheartsuit\" alt=\"\\heartsuit\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>表示先沿实轴做滑动</i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{u}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>，然后在沿虚轴做滑动</i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmu%5Cupdownarrow\" alt=\"\\mu\\updownarrow\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。<br/>我们刚刚定义了复平面的右上滑动，同理我们可以借助 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{u}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 和 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmu%5Cupdownarrow\" alt=\"\\mu\\updownarrow\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 具体的定义 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=8\" alt=\"8\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 个基本方向上的滑动。但是在此之前，我们还需要先对 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmu%5Cupdownarrow\" alt=\"\\mu\\updownarrow\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 做一个明确的定义。定义 <b><i>只考虑虚部的下滑动 </i></b>为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%2C%5Cquad+k%5Cmapsto+k%5C%2C%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C+l%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cl%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.8%7D\" alt=\"\\mu\\uparrow\\mathbb{R}\\to\\mathbb{R},\\quad k\\mapsto k\\,{\\diamondsuit}\\uparrow\\, l,\\,\\,l\\in\\mathbb{R}.\\tag{5.3.8}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>定义 <b><i>只考虑虚部的上滑动</i></b> 为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmu%5Cdownarrow%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%2C%5Cquad+k%5Cmapsto+k%5C%2C%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5Cdownarrow%5C%2C+l%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cl%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.9%7D\" alt=\"\\mu\\downarrow:\\mathbb{R}\\to\\mathbb{R},\\quad k\\mapsto k\\,{\\diamondsuit}\\downarrow\\, l,\\,\\,l\\in\\mathbb{R}.\\tag{5.3.9}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>接下来我们就可以具体地定义复平面的 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=8\" alt=\"8\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 个基本方向上的滑动了。定义 <b><i>复数集上的右上滑动 </i></b>：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=w%5Cnearrow%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D%2C%5Cquad+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%2C%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%5Cright%29%5Cmapsto+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%5Cright%29%3D%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5C%2C+j+%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28k%5C%2C%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2Cl%5Cright%29%2C%5Cquad+j%2C%5C%2Cl%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.10%7D\" alt=\"w\\nearrow:\\mathbb{R}\\times\\mathbb{R}\\to\\mathbb{C},\\quad \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{u},\\mu\\uparrow\\right)\\mapsto \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}\\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(\\mu\\uparrow\\right)=\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\diamondsuit}\\, j \\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(k\\,{\\diamondsuit}\\uparrow\\,l\\right),\\quad j,\\,l\\in\\mathbb{R}.\\tag{5.3.10}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>定义 <b><i>复数集上的右下滑动</i></b> ：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=w%5Csearrow%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D%2C%5Cquad+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%2C%5Cmu%5Cdownarrow%5Cright%29%5Cmapsto%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cmu%5Cdownarrow%5Cright%29%3D%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5C%2C+j+%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28k%5C%2C%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5Cdownarrow%5C%2Cl%5Cright%29%2C%5Cquad+j%2C%5C%2Cl%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.11%7D\" alt=\"w\\searrow:\\mathbb{R}\\times\\mathbb{R}\\to\\mathbb{C},\\quad \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{u},\\mu\\downarrow\\right)\\mapsto\\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}\\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(\\mu\\downarrow\\right)=\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\diamondsuit}\\, j \\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(k\\,{\\diamondsuit}\\downarrow\\,l\\right),\\quad j,\\,l\\in\\mathbb{R}.\\tag{5.3.11}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>定义 <b><i>复数集上的左上滑动</i></b> ：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=w%5Cnwarrow%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D%2C%5Cquad+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%2C%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%5Cright%29%5Cmapsto%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%5Cright%29%3D%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5C%2C+j%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28k%5C%2C%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C+l%5Cright%29%2C%5Cquad+j%2C%5C%2Cl%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.12%7D\" alt=\"w\\nwarrow:\\mathbb{R}\\times\\mathbb{R}\\to\\mathbb{C},\\quad \\left(\\underset{\\leftarrow}{u},\\mu\\uparrow\\right)\\mapsto\\left(\\underset{\\leftarrow}{u}\\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(\\mu\\uparrow\\right)=\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\diamondsuit}\\, j\\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(k\\,{\\diamondsuit}\\uparrow\\, l\\right),\\quad j,\\,l\\in\\mathbb{R}.\\tag{5.3.12}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>定义 <b><i>复数集上的左下滑动</i></b> ：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=w%5Cswarrow%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D%2C%5Cquad+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%2C%5Cmu%5Cdownarrow%5Cright%29%5Cmapsto%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cmu%5Cdownarrow%5Cright%29%3D%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5C%2Cj%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28k%5C%2C%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5Cdownarrow%5C%2Cl%5Cright%29%2C%5Cquad+j%2C%5C%2Cl%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.13%7D\" alt=\"w\\swarrow:\\mathbb{R}\\times\\mathbb{R}\\to\\mathbb{C},\\quad \\left(\\underset{\\leftarrow}{u},\\mu\\downarrow\\right)\\mapsto\\left(\\underset{\\leftarrow}{u}\\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(\\mu\\downarrow\\right)=\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\diamondsuit}\\,j\\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(k\\,{\\diamondsuit}\\downarrow\\,l\\right),\\quad j,\\,l\\in\\mathbb{R}.\\tag{5.3.13}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>定义 <b><i>复数集上的竖直上滑动</i></b> ：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=w%5Cuparrow%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D%2C%5Cquad+%5Cleft%28%5Cmathrm%7BId%7D_U%2C%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%5Cright%29%5Cmapsto%5Cleft%28%5Cmathrm%7BId%7D_U%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%5Cright%29%3Dk%5C%2C%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2Cl%2C%5Cquad+l%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.14%7D\" alt=\"w\\uparrow:\\mathbb{R}\\times\\mathbb{R}\\to\\mathbb{C},\\quad \\left(\\mathrm{Id}_U,\\mu\\uparrow\\right)\\mapsto\\left(\\mathrm{Id}_U\\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(\\mu\\uparrow\\right)=k\\,{\\diamondsuit}\\uparrow\\,l,\\quad l\\in\\mathbb{R}.\\tag{5.3.14}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>定义 <b><i>复数集上的竖直下滑动</i></b> ：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=w%5Cdownarrow%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D%2C%5Cquad+%5Cleft%28%5Cmathrm%7BId%7D_U%2C%5Cmu%5Cdownarrow%5Cright%29%5Cmapsto%5Cleft%28%5Cmathrm%7BId%7D_U%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cmu%5Cdownarrow%5Cright%29%3Dk%5C%2C%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5Cdownarrow%5C%2Cl%2C%5Cquad+l%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.15%7D\" alt=\"w\\downarrow:\\mathbb{R}\\times\\mathbb{R}\\to\\mathbb{C},\\quad \\left(\\mathrm{Id}_U,\\mu\\downarrow\\right)\\mapsto\\left(\\mathrm{Id}_U\\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(\\mu\\downarrow\\right)=k\\,{\\diamondsuit}\\downarrow\\,l,\\quad l\\in\\mathbb{R}.\\tag{5.3.15}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>定义 <b><i>复数集上的水平左滑动</i></b> ：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bw%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D%2C%5Cquad+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%2C%5Cmathrm%7BId%7D_%7BMU%7D%5Cright%29%5Cmapsto%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cmathrm%7BId%7D_%7BMU%7D%5Cright%29%3Di%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5C%2C+j%2C%5Cquad+j%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.16%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftarrow}{w}:\\mathbb{R}\\times\\mathbb{R}\\to\\mathbb{C},\\quad \\left(\\underset{\\leftarrow}{u},\\mathrm{Id}_{MU}\\right)\\mapsto\\left(\\underset{\\leftarrow}{u}\\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(\\mathrm{Id}_{MU}\\right)=i\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\diamondsuit}\\, j,\\quad j\\in\\mathbb{R}.\\tag{5.3.16}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>定义 <b><i>复数集上的水平右滑动</i></b> ：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bw%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D%2C%5Cquad+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%2C%5Cmathrm%7BId%7D_%7BMU%7D%5Cright%29%5Cmapsto%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cmathrm%7BId%7D_%7BMU%7D%5Cright%29%3Di%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5C%2C+j%2C%5Cquad+j%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.17%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{w}:\\mathbb{R}\\times\\mathbb{R}\\to\\mathbb{C},\\quad \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{u},\\mathrm{Id}_{MU}\\right)\\mapsto\\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}\\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(\\mathrm{Id}_{MU}\\right)=i\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\diamondsuit}\\, j,\\quad j\\in\\mathbb{R}.\\tag{5.3.17}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>下面我们通过例子来说明几个问题。<br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bi%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{i).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 我们对复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0%2B0%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"0+0\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 先做右上滑动 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5C%2C+1+%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28k%5C%2C%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C2%5Cright%29\" alt=\"\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\diamondsuit}\\, 1 \\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(k\\,{\\diamondsuit}\\uparrow\\,2\\right)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 得到结果 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2B2%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"1+2\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，再做右上滑动 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5C%2C+2+%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28k%5C%2C%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C1%5Cright%29\" alt=\"\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\diamondsuit}\\, 2 \\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(k\\,{\\diamondsuit}\\uparrow\\,1\\right)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 得到结果 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3%2B3%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"3+3\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，那么最终的效果与直接做右上滑动 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5C%2C+3+%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28k%5C%2C%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C3%5Cright%29\" alt=\"\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\diamondsuit}\\, 3 \\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(k\\,{\\diamondsuit}\\uparrow\\,3\\right)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 滑动的效果是一样的。这就说明了 <b><i>复数的滑动是可以复合的 </i></b>。<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fd886c9a6886f74148e8589151b9d29d_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"772\" data-rawheight=\"477\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"772\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fd886c9a6886f74148e8589151b9d29d_r.jpg\"/><figcaption>图片9：复数滑动的复合。</figcaption></figure><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{ii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 我们对复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0%2B0%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"0+0\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 先做右上滑动<img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5C%2C+1+%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28k%5C%2C%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C2%5Cright%29\" alt=\"\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\diamondsuit}\\, 1 \\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(k\\,{\\diamondsuit}\\uparrow\\,2\\right)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 得到结果 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2B2%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"1+2\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，再做左下滑动<img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5C%2C+1+%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28k%5C%2C%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5Cdownarrow%5C%2C2%5Cright%29\" alt=\"\\left(i\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\diamondsuit}\\, 1 \\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(k\\,{\\diamondsuit}\\downarrow\\,2\\right)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，结果又回到了 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0%2B0%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"0+0\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。这就说明了<b><i>复数的滑动是可逆的 </i></b>。具体而言，之前定义的复平面在八个基本方向上的滑动：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=w%5Cnearrow%2C%5C%2Cw%5Csearrow%2C%5C%2Cw%5Cnwarrow%2C%5C%2Cw%5Cswarrow%2C%5C%2Cw%5Cuparrow%2C%5C%2Cw%5Cdownarrow%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bw%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bw%7D%5Ctag%7B5.3.18%7D\" alt=\"w\\nearrow,\\,w\\searrow,\\,w\\nwarrow,\\,w\\swarrow,\\,w\\uparrow,\\,w\\downarrow,\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{w},\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{w}\\tag{5.3.18}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>的逆分别是(从左至右)分别是：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=w%5Cswarrow%2C%5C%2Cw%5Cnwarrow%2C%5C%2Cw%5Csearrow%2C%5C%2Cw%5Cnearrow%2C%5C%2Cw%5Cdownarrow%2C%5C%2Cw%5Cuparrow%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bw%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7Bw%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.3.19%7D\" alt=\"w\\swarrow,\\,w\\nwarrow,\\,w\\searrow,\\,w\\nearrow,\\,w\\downarrow,\\,w\\uparrow,\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{w},\\,\\underset{\\leftarrow}{w}.\\tag{5.3.19}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{iii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 复数集上的任意两个滑动的复合还是还是一个复数集上的滑动。即定义在<b><i>复数集上的滑动对复合运算</i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccirc\" alt=\"\\circ\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>是封闭的 </i></b>。</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge+%5Cbm%7B5.4%7D\" alt=\"\\large \\bm{5.4}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b>非零复数的旋转伸缩</b></p><p>现在终于来到了我们的最后一个部分了。非零复数的伸缩分为两种，一种是非零复数的非零实数倍的伸缩，这种伸缩我们也称为 <b><i>纯伸缩</i></b> 。另外一种是非零复数的非零复数倍的伸缩，这种伸缩我们称为 <b><i>带旋转的伸缩</i></b> 。对于带旋转的伸缩，我们还需定义的是 <b><i>纯旋转</i></b> 的概念。首先我们先来看非零复数的纯伸缩。</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbm%7B5.4.1%7D\" alt=\"\\bm{5.4.1}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b>非零复数的纯伸缩</b></p><blockquote><b>这是原文中最为复杂的一部分，所以这里我打算换一种简单的定义方式。</b></blockquote><figure data-size=\"normal\"><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f0769f2715e7f555f1cce5dfa70e10cc_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"368\" data-rawheight=\"388\" class=\"content_image\" width=\"368\"/><figcaption>图片10</figcaption></figure><p>如图片 10 所示，我们将复平面拉长为原来的两倍，这相当于我们同时将实轴与虚轴拉长到原来的两倍。而非零实数的正实数倍拉长我们之前已经定义过了，并且，对虚轴如果我们只考虑它的虚部的话，那么这里虚轴的拉长我们也可以视为非零实数的正实数倍拉长。这或许为我们定义非零复数的纯伸缩提供了一种思路。所以我们不妨顺着这个思路继续深入。我们首先要做的就是仿照非零实数的正实数倍拉长，定义一个对应的 <b><i>只考虑虚轴的拉长 。</i></b></p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=r%5Cupdownarrow%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%2C%5Cquad+i%5Cmapsto+%7B%5Cblacktriangle%7D%5Cupdownarrow%5Cleft%28i%5C%2C%7B%5Cblacklozenge%7D%5Cupdownarrow%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%7B%5Cblacktriangle%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2Cj%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cj%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne0%7D%5Ctag%7B5.4.1.1%7D.\" alt=\"r\\updownarrow:\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\to\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0},\\quad i\\mapsto {\\blacktriangle}\\updownarrow\\left(i\\,{\\blacklozenge}\\updownarrow\\, \\left({\\blacktriangle}\\uparrow\\,j\\right)\\right),\\,\\,j\\in\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne0}\\tag{5.4.1.1}.\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>这里将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 中的左右箭头 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleftrightarrow\" alt=\"\\leftrightarrow\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 换成了上下箭头 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cupdownarrow\" alt=\"\\updownarrow\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，表示的是 <b><i>竖直方向上的伸缩 </i></b>。显然， <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=r\" alt=\"r\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 也具有 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=8\" alt=\"8\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 种子情况。</p><p>其中 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 必须与 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=r%5Cupdownarrow\" alt=\"r\\updownarrow\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>必须同为拉长或者同为收缩，并且同为拉长时，拉长的倍数必须相等；同为收缩时，收缩的倍数必须相等 </i></b>。</p><p>并且我们知道 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的定义域与值域也是 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D\" alt=\"\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 与 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D\" alt=\"\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。这样我们就可以先来定义实部和虚部都不等于零的复数的伸缩了：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5E%2A%5Cupdownarrow%7D%3A%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%7D%5C%2C%5Cclubsuit%5C%2Cr%5Cupdownarrow.%5Ctag%7B5.4.1.2%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta^*\\updownarrow}:=\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma}\\,\\clubsuit\\,r\\updownarrow.\\tag{5.4.1.2}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>其中运算 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cclubsuit\" alt=\"\\clubsuit\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 表示 <b><i>实轴与虚轴同时做相同倍数的拉长或者相同倍数的收缩</i></b> 。另外我们知道，非零复数还包括在实轴上的复数和在虚轴上的复数。那么我们进一步定义在实轴上的复数的伸缩为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow_%7B%5Cmathrm%7Bpas.%7D%7D%7D%5C%2C%3A%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.4.1.3%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta\\updownarrow_{\\mathrm{pas.}}}\\,:=\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma}.\\tag{5.4.1.3}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>而在虚轴上的复数的伸缩我们定义为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow_%7B%5Cmathrm%7Bpas.%7D%7D%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow%7D%5C%2C%3A%3D+r%5Cupdownarrow.%5Ctag%7B5.4.1.4%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow_{\\mathrm{pas.}}}{\\delta\\updownarrow}\\,:= r\\updownarrow.\\tag{5.4.1.4}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p> 式 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%285.4.1.3%29%2C%5C%2C%285.4.1.4%29\" alt=\"(5.4.1.3),\\,(5.4.1.4)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 并不意味着当其中一个轴做伸缩时另外一个轴就不做相同的伸缩了，所以这里我们可以理解为当实轴做伸缩 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleftrightarrow\" alt=\"\\leftrightarrow\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 时，虚轴在 <b><i>被动地做与实轴一样的伸缩</i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cupdownarrow_%7B%5Cmathrm%7Bpas.%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\updownarrow_{\\mathrm{pas.}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ；当虚轴做伸缩 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cupdownarrow\" alt=\"\\updownarrow\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 时，实轴在 <b><i>被动地做与虚轴一样的伸缩</i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleftrightarrow_%7B%5Cmathrm%7Bpas.%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\leftrightarrow_{\\mathrm{pas.}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。</p><p>现在我们将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5E%2A%5Cupdownarrow%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow_%7B%5Cmathrm%7Bpas.%7D%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow_%7B%5Cmathrm%7Bpas.%7D%7D%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta^*\\updownarrow},\\,\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta\\updownarrow_{\\mathrm{pas.}}},\\,\\underset{\\leftrightarrow_{\\mathrm{pas.}}}{\\delta\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 合并到一起，并统一定义为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Barray%7D%7Bc%7D+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow%7D%5C%2C%3A%5Cleft%28%5Cleft%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Ccup%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Ctimes%5C%7B0%5C%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Ccup%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5C%7B0%5C%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%5Cto+%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%2C%5Cquad+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%7D%5C%2C%5Cclubsuit%5C%2Cr%5Cupdownarrow.%5Ctag%7B5.4.1.5%7D+%5Cend%7Barray%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{array}{c} \\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta\\updownarrow}\\,:\\left(\\left(\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\times\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\right)\\,\\cup\\,\\left(\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\times\\{0\\}\\right)\\,\\cup\\,\\left(\\{0\\}\\times\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\right)\\right)\\to \\mathbb{C}_{\\ne 0},\\quad \\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma}\\,\\clubsuit\\,r\\updownarrow.\\tag{5.4.1.5} \\end{array}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>我们根据非零复数所处的位置便可知道 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 为 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5E%2A%5Cupdownarrow%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow_%7B%5Cmathrm%7Bpas.%7D%7D%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow_%7B%5Cmathrm%7Bpas.%7D%7D%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta^*\\updownarrow},\\,\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta\\updownarrow_{\\mathrm{pas.}}},\\,\\underset{\\leftrightarrow_{\\mathrm{pas.}}}{\\delta\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 中的哪一个。具体的我们可以定义 <b><i>非零复数的纯拉长 </i></b>为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Barray%7D%7Bc%7D+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cuparrow%7D%5C%2C%3A%5Cleft%28%5Cleft%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Ccup%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Ctimes%5C%7B0%5C%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Ccup%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5C%7B0%5C%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%5Cto+%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%2C%5Cquad+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%7D%5C%2C%5Cclubsuit%5C%2Cr%5Cuparrow.%5Ctag%7B5.4.1.6%7D+%5Cend%7Barray%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{array}{c} \\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\delta\\uparrow}\\,:\\left(\\left(\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\times\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\right)\\,\\cup\\,\\left(\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\times\\{0\\}\\right)\\,\\cup\\,\\left(\\{0\\}\\times\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\right)\\right)\\to \\mathbb{C}_{\\ne 0},\\quad \\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\gamma}\\,\\clubsuit\\,r\\uparrow.\\tag{5.4.1.6} \\end{array}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>定义<b><i>非零复数的纯收缩 </i></b>为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Barray%7D%7Bc%7D+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cdownarrow%7D%5C%2C%3A%5Cleft%28%5Cleft%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Ccup%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Ctimes%5C%7B0%5C%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Ccup%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5C%7B0%5C%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%5Cto+%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%2C%5Cquad+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%7D%5C%2C%5Cclubsuit%5C%2Cr%5Cdownarrow.%5Ctag%7B5.4.1.7%7D+%5Cend%7Barray%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{array}{c} \\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\delta\\downarrow}\\,:\\left(\\left(\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\times\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\right)\\,\\cup\\,\\left(\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\times\\{0\\}\\right)\\,\\cup\\,\\left(\\{0\\}\\times\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\right)\\right)\\to \\mathbb{C}_{\\ne 0},\\quad \\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\gamma}\\,\\clubsuit\\,r\\downarrow.\\tag{5.4.1.7} \\end{array}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>最后我们来谈一谈 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 复合的问题。对于 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow_%7B%5Cmathrm%7Bpas.%7D%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta\\updownarrow_{\\mathrm{pas.}}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 或者 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow_%7B%5Cmathrm%7Bpas.%7D%7D%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow_{\\mathrm{pas.}}}{\\delta\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的复合情况这里就不再说明了，因为这两种情况下的复合与非零实数伸缩的复合原理是一样的。不过可以从这两种特殊情况中看到的是： <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 复合也会涉及到有效复合与无效复合这两种不同的情况。但是， <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的复合是否有效也完全取决于 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma}\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  (或  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=r%5Cupdownarrow\" alt=\"r\\updownarrow\" eeimg=\"1\"/> )之间的复合是否有效。</p><blockquote>举一个实际的例子。比如我想将复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2B2%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"1+2\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 做  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28-2%29\" alt=\"(-2)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 倍的拉长，这就意味着我们要同时对实轴和虚轴做<img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28-2%29\" alt=\"(-2)\" eeimg=\"1\"/>倍的拉长：  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cleft%281%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacklozenge%5E%2B%7D%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%28-2%29%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cleft%281%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacklozenge%5E%2B%7D%5C%2C+2%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D2%3D-2.%5Ctag%7B5.4.1.8%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\gamma^{+\\to-}}=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\blacktriangle^{+}}\\left(1\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacklozenge^+}\\, \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacktriangle^{-}}\\,(-2)\\right)\\right)=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\blacktriangle^{+}}\\left(1\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacklozenge^+}\\, 2\\right)=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\blacktriangle^{+}}2=-2.\\tag{5.4.1.8}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%7Br%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%5Cuparrow%3D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cdownarrow%5Cleft%282%5C%2C%7B%5Cblacklozenge%5E%2B%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C%28-2%29%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cdownarrow%5Cleft%282%5C%2C%7B%5Cblacklozenge%5E%2B%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C+2%5Cright%29%3D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cdownarrow4%3D-4.%5Ctag%7B5.4.1.9%7D\" alt=\"{r^{+\\to-}}\\uparrow={\\blacktriangle^{+}}\\downarrow\\left(2\\,{\\blacklozenge^+}\\uparrow\\, \\left({\\blacktriangle^{-}}\\uparrow\\,(-2)\\right)\\right)={\\blacktriangle^{+}}\\downarrow\\left(2\\,{\\blacklozenge^+}\\uparrow\\, 2\\right)={\\blacktriangle^{+}}\\downarrow4=-4.\\tag{5.4.1.9}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>这样得到的结果是 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-2-4%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"-2-4\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。因为此时 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=i%2C%5C%2Cj\" alt=\"i,\\,j\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 都是负实数(即 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28i%2Cj%29\" alt=\"(i,j)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 为一负有序实数对)，所以我们就不能进一步对 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28-2%2C-4%29\" alt=\"(-2,-4)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 做正实数的伸缩的了(即正有序实数对的负伸缩不能复合其自身，即这种复合就是无效的)。但是我们可以对负有序实数对 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28-2%2C-4%29\" alt=\"(-2,-4)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 做负有序实数对的伸缩，比如再对它做一个 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28-2%29\" alt=\"(-2)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 倍的拉长： <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B-%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28-2%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacklozenge%5E-%7D%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5C%2C%28-2%29%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cleft%28-2%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacklozenge%5E-%7D%5C%2C+2%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B-%7D%7D%28-4%29%3D4.%5Ctag%7B5.4.1.10%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\gamma^{-\\to+}}=\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacktriangle^{-}}\\left(-2\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacklozenge^-}\\, \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacktriangle^{-}}\\,(-2)\\right)\\right)=\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacktriangle^{-}}\\left(-2\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacklozenge^-}\\, 2\\right)=\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacktriangle^{-}}(-4)=4.\\tag{5.4.1.10}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%7Br%5E%7B-%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%5Cuparrow%3D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cuparrow%5Cleft%28-4%5C%2C%7B%5Cblacklozenge%5E-%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C%28-2%29%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B-%7D%7D%5Cuparrow%5Cleft%28-4%5C%2C%7B%5Cblacklozenge%5E-%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C+2%5Cright%29%3D%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B-%7D%5Cuparrow%28-8%29%3D8.%5Ctag%7B5.4.1.11%7D\" alt=\"{r^{-\\to+}}\\uparrow={\\blacktriangle^{-}}\\uparrow\\left(-4\\,{\\blacklozenge^-}\\uparrow\\, \\left({\\blacktriangle^{-}}\\uparrow\\,(-2)\\right)\\right)={\\blacktriangle^{-}}\\uparrow\\left(-4\\,{\\blacklozenge^-}\\uparrow\\, 2\\right)=\\blacktriangle^{-}\\uparrow(-8)=8.\\tag{5.4.1.11}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>这样最终的结果是 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=4%2B8%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"4+8\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。</blockquote><p>对于无效的复合，我们依然将其结果定义为复合之前的变换。这样就保证了 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 对复合的封闭性。并且我们断言： <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的所有情况都是可逆的。</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbm%7B5.4.2%7D\" alt=\"\\bm{5.4.2}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b>非零复数的纯旋转</b></p><p>非零复数的纯旋转的定义可以说是非常直观的。首先是 <b><i>非零复数的纯逆时针旋转</i></b> ：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=p_%7B%5Ccirclearrowleft%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%5Ctimes%5B0%2C2%5Cpi%29%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%2C%5Cquad+%28r%2C%5Cphi%29%5Cmapsto+%5Cleft%28r%5Cangle%5Cphi%5Cright%29%5Ccirclearrowleft%5Ctheta%2C%5Cquad%5Ctheta%5Cin%5B0%2C2%5Cpi%29.%5Ctag%7B5.4.2.1%7D\" alt=\"p_{\\circlearrowleft}:\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}\\times[0,2\\pi)\\to\\mathbb{C}_{\\ne 0},\\quad (r,\\phi)\\mapsto \\left(r\\angle\\phi\\right)\\circlearrowleft\\theta,\\quad\\theta\\in[0,2\\pi).\\tag{5.4.2.1}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>然后是 <b><i>非零复数的纯顺时针旋转</i></b> ：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=p_%7B%5Ccirclearrowright%7D%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%5Ctimes%5B0%2C2%5Cpi%29%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%2C%5Cquad+%28r%2C%5Cphi%29%5Cmapsto+%5Cleft%28r%5Cangle%5Cphi%5Cright%29%5Ccirclearrowright%5Ctheta%2C%5Cquad%5Ctheta%5Cin%5B0%2C2%5Cpi%29.%5Ctag%7B5.4.2.2%7D\" alt=\"p_{\\circlearrowright}:\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}\\times[0,2\\pi)\\to\\mathbb{C}_{\\ne 0},\\quad (r,\\phi)\\mapsto \\left(r\\angle\\phi\\right)\\circlearrowright\\theta,\\quad\\theta\\in[0,2\\pi).\\tag{5.4.2.2}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><blockquote>举个实际的例子：<br/> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%282%2C60%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D%29%5Cmapsto+%5Cleft%282%5Cangle60%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D%5Cright%29%5Ccirclearrowleft15%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D%5Ctag%7B5.4.2.3%7D%3D2%5Cangle75%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D.\" alt=\"(2,60^{\\circ})\\mapsto \\left(2\\angle60^{\\circ}\\right)\\circlearrowleft15^{\\circ}\\tag{5.4.2.3}=2\\angle75^{\\circ}.\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>表示的就是将长度为 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2\" alt=\"2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的，辐角为 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=60%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"60^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的复数逆时针旋转 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=15%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"15^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。</blockquote><p>并且我们容易验证以下几点：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bi%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{i).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 定义在复数集上的纯旋转是可以复合的。比如先将复平面逆时针旋转 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=45%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"45^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> (即 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleft%28r%5Cangle%5Cphi%5Cright%29%5Ccirclearrowleft+45%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"\\left(r\\angle\\phi\\right)\\circlearrowleft 45^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> )，然后再逆时针旋转 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=45%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"45^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> (即 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleft%28r%5Cangle%5Cphi%5Cright%29%5Ccirclearrowleft+45%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"\\left(r\\angle\\phi\\right)\\circlearrowleft 45^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> )，则最后的效果与直接逆时针旋转 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=90%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"90^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> (即  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleft%28r%5Cangle%5Cphi%5Cright%29%5Ccirclearrowleft+90%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"\\left(r\\angle\\phi\\right)\\circlearrowleft 90^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> )的效果是一致的，如图11所示：</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7666bccb59210c0d69eab85dbad8eb1b_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"830\" data-rawheight=\"213\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"830\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7666bccb59210c0d69eab85dbad8eb1b_r.jpg\"/><figcaption>图片11</figcaption></figure><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{ii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 定义在复数集上的纯旋转是双射的(即可逆的)。因为我们可以将任意一个非零的复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=r%5Cangle%5Cphi\" alt=\"r\\angle\\phi\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 通过逆时针(或顺时针)旋转角度 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ctheta\" alt=\"\\theta\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 都可对应于复平面上的一个复数。而且反过来，将复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleft%28r%5Cangle%5Cphi%5Cright%29%5Ccirclearrowleft%5Ctheta\" alt=\"\\left(r\\angle\\phi\\right)\\circlearrowleft\\theta\" eeimg=\"1\"/> (或  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleft%28r%5Cangle%5Cphi%5Cright%29%5Ccirclearrowleft%5Ctheta\" alt=\"\\left(r\\angle\\phi\\right)\\circlearrowleft\\theta\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ) 顺时针(或逆时针)旋转之后都可以唯一对应到一个非零的复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=r%5Cangle%5Cphi\" alt=\"r\\angle\\phi\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  。</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{iii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 定义在复数集上的任意两个纯旋转的复合还是一个复数集上的纯旋转。即定义在复数集上的纯旋转对复合运算 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccirc\" alt=\"\\circ\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 是封闭的。</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbm%7B5.4.3%7D\" alt=\"\\bm{5.4.3}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b>非零复数的带旋转的伸缩</b></p><p>在定义非零复数的带旋转的伸缩之前我们首先要来思考一个问题：我们是否真的仅仅将非零复数的纯伸缩与纯旋转进行复合就可以了？答案是否定的。但这是为什么呢？如果不将两者直接复合那应该如何定义非零复数的的带旋转的伸缩呢？这里我们不妨先回忆我们非零复数的纯伸缩的定义。在我们讨论非零复数的纯伸缩的时候我们发现，对于非零复数的正实数伸缩，伸缩的结果总是没有镜像效果的(我们可以将这种伸缩称为非零复数的 <b><i>保向伸缩</i></b> )，即非零复数的正实数伸缩总是将一个复数直接进行伸缩而不用考虑镜像(这一点的根源是非零实数的正实数伸缩)。而非零复数的负实数伸缩总是会产生镜像作用的(即复数在被拉长的同时会通过复平面的原点中心对称，这一点的根源是非零实数的负实数伸缩)，而这种镜像作用恰好对应了非零复数的纯 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=180%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"180^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 旋转。所以我们如果直接将非零复数的纯伸缩与非零复数的纯旋转复合的话会很混乱。所以取而代之的是，我们将 <b><i>非零复数的正实数伸缩与非零复数的纯旋转进行复合 </i></b>，进而来定义非零复数的带旋转的伸缩。</p><p>这里我们首先要给出具体的非零复数的正实数伸缩的定义。我们将要分八种情况进行说明。我们将“挖掉原点的”复平面拆解一下，拆解为一下八个部分：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bi%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{i).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>实轴正半轴 </i></b>；</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{ii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>实轴负半轴</i></b> ；</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{iii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>虚轴正半轴</i></b> ；</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biv%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{iv).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>虚轴负半轴</i></b> ；</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bv%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{v).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>实部与虚部均大于零的部分</i></b> ；</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bvi%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{vi).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>实部小于零，但是虚部大于零的部分</i></b> ；</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bvii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{vii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>实部与虚部均小于零的部分</i></b> ；</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bviii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{viii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>实部大于零，但是虚部小于零的部分</i></b> 。</p><p>之后我将 <b><i>使用相应的编号来代表这八个部分 </i></b>。首先要明确的是 <b><i>任意一个非零复数一定处于这八个部分中的一个，且同时只能属于唯一的一个 </i></b>。所以我们定义非零复数的正实数伸缩可以通过对这八种情况分别进行定义。下面我们就来逐一的定义一下：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bi%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{i).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5E%7B%28%2B%2C0%29%5Cto%28%2B%2C0%29%7D%5Cupdownarrow_%7B%5Cmathrm%7Bpas.%7D%7D%7D%5C%2C%3A%3D+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.4.3.1%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta^{(+,0)\\to(+,0)}\\updownarrow_{\\mathrm{pas.}}}\\,:= \\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma^{+\\to+}}.\\tag{5.4.3.1}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{ii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5E%7B%28-%2C0%29%5Cto%28-%2C0%29%7D%5Cupdownarrow_%7B%5Cmathrm%7Bpas.%7D%7D%7D%5C%2C%3A%3D+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.4.3.2%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta^{(-,0)\\to(-,0)}\\updownarrow_{\\mathrm{pas.}}}\\,:= \\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma^{-\\to-}}.\\tag{5.4.3.2}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{iii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow_%7B%5Cmathrm%7Bpas.%7D%7D%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5E%7B%280%2C%2B%29%5Cto%280%2C%2B%29%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%5C%2C%3A%3D+r%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%5Cupdownarrow.%5Ctag%7B5.4.3.3%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow_{\\mathrm{pas.}}}{\\delta^{(0,+)\\to(0,+)}\\updownarrow}\\,:= r^{+\\to+}\\updownarrow.\\tag{5.4.3.3}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biv%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{iv).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow_%7B%5Cmathrm%7Bpas.%7D%7D%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5E%7B%280%2C-%29%5Cto%280%2C-%29%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%5C%2C%3A%3D+r%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%5Cupdownarrow.%5Ctag%7B5.4.3.4%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow_{\\mathrm{pas.}}}{\\delta^{(0,-)\\to(0,-)}\\updownarrow}\\,:= r^{-\\to-}\\updownarrow.\\tag{5.4.3.4}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bv%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{v).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5E%7B%28%2B%2C%2B%29%5Cto%28%2B%2C%2B%29%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%3A%3D+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C%5Cclubsuit%5C%2Cr%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%5Cupdownarrow.%5Ctag%7B5.4.3.5%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta^{(+,+)\\to(+,+)}\\updownarrow}:= \\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma^{+\\to+}}\\,\\clubsuit\\,r^{+\\to+}\\updownarrow.\\tag{5.4.3.5}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bvi%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{vi).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5E%7B%28-%2C%2B%29%5Cto%28-%2C%2B%29%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%3A%3D+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D%5C%2C%5Cclubsuit%5C%2Cr%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%5Cupdownarrow.%5Ctag%7B5.4.3.6%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta^{(-,+)\\to(-,+)}\\updownarrow}:= \\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma^{-\\to-}}\\,\\clubsuit\\,r^{+\\to+}\\updownarrow.\\tag{5.4.3.6}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bvii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{vii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5E%7B%28-%2C-%29%5Cto%28-%2C-%29%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%3A%3D+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%7D%5C%2C%5Cclubsuit%5C%2Cr%5E%7B-%5Cto-%7D%5Cupdownarrow.%5Ctag%7B5.4.3.7%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta^{(-,-)\\to(-,-)}\\updownarrow}:= \\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma^{-\\to-}}\\,\\clubsuit\\,r^{-\\to-}\\updownarrow.\\tag{5.4.3.7}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bviii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{viii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5E%7B%28%2B%2C-%29%5Cto%28%2B%2C-%29%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%3A%3D+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%5C%2C%5Cclubsuit%5C%2Cr%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%5Cupdownarrow.%5Ctag%7B5.4.3.8%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta^{(+,-)\\to(+,-)}\\updownarrow}:= \\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\gamma^{+\\to-}}\\,\\clubsuit\\,r^{+\\to-}\\updownarrow.\\tag{5.4.3.8}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>我们将以上八种情况合并为映射 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%5C%2C%3A%5Cleft%28%5Cleft%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Ccup%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Ctimes%5C%7B0%5C%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Ccup%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5C%7B0%5C%7D%5Ctimes%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%5Cto+%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.}}\\updownarrow}\\,:\\left(\\left(\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\times\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\right)\\,\\cup\\,\\left(\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\times\\{0\\}\\right)\\,\\cup\\,\\left(\\{0\\}\\times\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne 0}\\right)\\right)\\to \\mathbb{C}_{\\ne 0}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。根据复数所处的位置我们可以明确 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.}}\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 应为以上八种情况中的哪一种。</p><p>现在非零复数的正实数倍拉长 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.}}\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 已经定义好了，下面我们就可以来定义非零复数带旋转的伸缩了。如之前所述，非零复数带旋转的伸缩可由为零复数的正实数倍拉长与非零复数的纯旋转复合得到(我们下面 <b><i>只讨论逆时针旋转 </i></b>，顺时针旋转同理)：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cpsi%3A%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%5Cne0%7D%5Ctimes%5B0%2C2%5Cpi%29%5Cto%5Cmathbb%7BC%7D_%7B%5Cne+0%7D%2C%5Cquad+%28r%2C%5Cphi%29%5Cmapsto%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%5C%2C%5Ccirc+%5Cleft%28%5Cleft%28r%5Cangle%5Cphi%5Cright%29%5Ccirclearrowleft%5Ctheta%5Cright%29%5Cright%29.%5Ctag%7B5.4.3.9%7D\" alt=\"\\psi:\\mathbb{R}_{\\ne0}\\times[0,2\\pi)\\to\\mathbb{C}_{\\ne 0},\\quad (r,\\phi)\\mapsto\\left(\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.}}\\updownarrow}\\,\\circ \\left(\\left(r\\angle\\phi\\right)\\circlearrowleft\\theta\\right)\\right).\\tag{5.4.3.9}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><blockquote>举一个具体的例子： 先将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csqrt%7B3%7D%2Bi\" alt=\"\\sqrt{3}+i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 逆时针 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ctheta%3D30%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"\\theta=30^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的旋转得到： <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%282%2C30%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D%29%5Cmapsto%5Cleft%282%5Cangle30%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D%5Cright%29%5Ccirclearrowleft30%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D%3D2%5Cangle60%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.4.3.10%7D\" alt=\"(2,30^{\\circ})\\mapsto\\left(2\\angle30^{\\circ}\\right)\\circlearrowleft30^{\\circ}=2\\angle60^{\\circ}.\\tag{5.4.3.10}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>变成复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2B%5Csqrt%7B3%7D%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"1+\\sqrt{3}\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 之后再拉长 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2\" alt=\"2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 倍： <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cleft%281%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacklozenge%7D%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5C%2C2%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cleft%281%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacklozenge%7D%5C%2C+2%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D2%3D2.%5Ctag%7B5.4.3.11%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\gamma^{+\\to+}}=\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacktriangle^{+}}\\left(1\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacklozenge}\\, \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacktriangle^{+}}\\,2\\right)\\right)=\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacktriangle^{+}}\\left(1\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacklozenge}\\, 2\\right)=\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacktriangle^{+}}2=2.\\tag{5.4.3.11}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%7Br%5E%7B%2B%5Cto%2B%7D%7D%5Cuparrow%3D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cuparrow%5Cleft%28%5Csqrt%7B3%7D%5C%2C%7B%5Cblacklozenge%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C2%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cuparrow%5Cleft%28%5Csqrt%7B3%7D%5C%2C%7B%5Cblacklozenge%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C+2%5Cright%29%3D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%7B%2B%7D%7D%5Cuparrow2%5Csqrt+3%3D2%5Csqrt+3.%5Ctag%7B5.4.3.12%7D\" alt=\"{r^{+\\to+}}\\uparrow={\\blacktriangle^{+}}\\uparrow\\left(\\sqrt{3}\\,{\\blacklozenge}\\uparrow\\, \\left({\\blacktriangle^{+}}\\uparrow\\,2\\right)\\right)={\\blacktriangle^{+}}\\uparrow\\left(\\sqrt{3}\\,{\\blacklozenge}\\uparrow\\, 2\\right)={\\blacktriangle^{+}}\\uparrow2\\sqrt 3=2\\sqrt 3.\\tag{5.4.3.12}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <br/>最后得到结果 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2%2B2%5Ccdot%5Csqrt%7B3%7D%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"2+2\\cdot\\sqrt{3}\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。</blockquote><p>在之前的讨论中，我们知道 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%5Cright%29\" alt=\"\\left(\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.}}\\updownarrow}\\right)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 与  <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=p_%7B%5Ccirclearrowleft%7D\" alt=\"p_{\\circlearrowleft}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 都是双射的，则他们的复合 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cpsi\" alt=\"\\psi\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 也是双射的。于是，当两个 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cpsi\" alt=\"\\psi\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 之间可以复合时，复合的结果自然也是双射的。所以我们需要重点讨论的是 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cpsi\" alt=\"\\psi\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的可复合性。现在设：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cpsi_%7Ba%7D%3A%3D%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%2Ca%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%5Ccirc+%5C%2Cp_%7B%5Ccirclearrowleft%2Ca%7D%5Cright%29%2C%5Cquad+%5Cpsi_%7Bb%7D%3A%3D%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%2Cb%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%5Ccirc+%5C%2Cp_%7B%5Ccirclearrowleft%2Cb%7D%5Cright%29.%5Ctag%7B5.4.3.13%7D\" alt=\"\\psi_{a}:=\\left(\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.},a}\\updownarrow}\\circ \\,p_{\\circlearrowleft,a}\\right),\\quad \\psi_{b}:=\\left(\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.},b}\\updownarrow}\\circ \\,p_{\\circlearrowleft,b}\\right).\\tag{5.4.3.13}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>我们可以将复合 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cpsi_a%5Ccirc%5Cpsi_b\" alt=\"\\psi_a\\circ\\psi_b\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 写为：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cpsi_a%5Ccirc%5Cpsi_b%3D%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%2Ca%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%5Ccirc%5C%2C+p_%7B%5Ccirclearrowleft%2Ca%7D%5Cright%29%5Ccirc%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%2Cb%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%5Ccirc%5C%2Cp_%7B%5Ccirclearrowleft%2Cb%7D%5Cright%29.%5Ctag%7B5.4.3.14%7D\" alt=\"\\psi_a\\circ\\psi_b=\\left(\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.},a}\\updownarrow}\\circ\\, p_{\\circlearrowleft,a}\\right)\\circ\\left(\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.},b}\\updownarrow}\\circ\\,p_{\\circlearrowleft,b}\\right).\\tag{5.4.3.14}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>复合的有效性取决于 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%2Ca%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.},a}\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 与 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%2Cb%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.},b}\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 复合的合法性。为了保证两个非零复数的正实数倍拉长复合的合法性，我们<b><i>必须要留意的是做完</i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%2Cb%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.},b}\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>之后非零复数所处的位置</i></b>，<b><i>然后再根据位置从前述的八种情况中选出对应的一种</i></b> <img
