src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%2Ca%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.},a}\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>进行复合 </i></b>。在 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%2Ca%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%5Ccirc+%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%2Cb%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.},a}\\updownarrow}\\circ \\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.},b}\\updownarrow}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 无效时我们定义：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cpsi_a%5Ccirc%5Cpsi_b%3D%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%2Ca%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%5Ccirc%5C%2C+p_%7B%5Ccirclearrowleft%2Ca%7D%5Cright%29%5Ccirc%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%2Cb%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%5Ccirc+%5C%2Cp_%7B%5Ccirclearrowleft%2Cb%7D%5Cright%29%3A%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftrightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%2Cb%7D%5Cupdownarrow%7D%5Ccirc+%5C%2Cp_%7B%5Ccirclearrowleft%2Cb%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.4.3.15%7D\" alt=\"\\psi_a\\circ\\psi_b=\\left(\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.},a}\\updownarrow}\\circ\\, p_{\\circlearrowleft,a}\\right)\\circ\\left(\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.},b}\\updownarrow}\\circ \\,p_{\\circlearrowleft,b}\\right):=\\underset{\\leftrightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.},b}\\updownarrow}\\circ \\,p_{\\circlearrowleft,b}.\\tag{5.4.3.15}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>即保持复合之前的旋转伸缩，这一定义与非零实数的非零实数倍拉长的无效复合的定义是类似的。并且由合法复合与非合法复合的定义我们保证了 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cpsi\" alt=\"\\psi\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 对复合运算是封闭的。</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbm%7B5.4.4%7D\" alt=\"\\bm{5.4.4}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b>站在群的角度上来理解代数运算</b></p><p>在这之前我们已经做足了铺垫，现在我们可以站在群的角度上来理解代数运算了。整数和有理数我们就不再讨论了。我们只讨论实数与复数。首先我们先给出结论：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7B%5Ccolor%7Bred%7D%7BTheorem%5Cquad+5.4.1%3A%7D%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\bm{\\rm{\\color{red}{Theorem\\quad 5.4.1:}}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bi%29.%7D+\" alt=\"\\rm{i).} \" eeimg=\"1\"/> 实数的滑动对应于实数的加法； </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bii%29.%7D+\" alt=\"\\rm{ii).} \" eeimg=\"1\"/> 非零实数的非零实数倍伸缩对应于非零实数的乘法；</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biii%29.%7D+\" alt=\"\\rm{iii).} \" eeimg=\"1\"/> 复数的滑动对应于复数的加法；</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biv%29.%7D+\" alt=\"\\rm{iv).} \" eeimg=\"1\"/> 非零复数的纯伸缩对应于非零复数与非零实数的乘法；</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bv%29.%7D+\" alt=\"\\rm{v).} \" eeimg=\"1\"/> 非零复数的旋转伸缩对应于非零复数与非零复数的乘法。</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccolor%7Bred%7D%7B%5Clarge%5Cblacksquare%7D\" alt=\"\\color{red}{\\large\\blacksquare}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><blockquote><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%7B%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7BRemark%3A%7D%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large{\\bm{\\rm{Remark:}}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  这里我们没有为复数的纯旋转找到对应关系。这一关系我们将在下一节中补上。</blockquote><p>下面我就仅对 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biii%7D%29%5Csim%5Crm%7Bv%7D%29\" alt=\"\\rm{iii})\\sim\\rm{v})\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 各举一个例子。</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Clarge%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7B%5Ccolor%7BGreen%7D%7BExample%5Cquad+5.4.1%3A%7D%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\large\\bm{\\rm{\\color{Green}{Example\\quad 5.4.1:}}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biii%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{iii).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 对于复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2B2%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"1+2\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，给它加上另一个复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=3%2B4%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"3+4\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 得到 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=4%2B6%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"4+6\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。这相当于对复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2B2%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"1+2\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 做了一个右上滑动，即：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=w%5Cnearrow%3A%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%2C%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%5Cright%29%5Cmapsto+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7Bu%7D%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%28%5Cmu%5Cuparrow%5Cright%29%3D%5Cleft%281%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5C%2C+3+%5Cright%29%5C%2C%5Cheartsuit%5C%2C%5Cleft%282%5C%2C%7B%5Cdiamondsuit%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C4%5Cright%29.%5Ctag%7B5.4.4.1%7D\" alt=\"w\\nearrow:\\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{u},\\mu\\uparrow\\right)\\mapsto \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{u}\\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(\\mu\\uparrow\\right)=\\left(1\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\diamondsuit}\\, 3 \\right)\\,\\heartsuit\\,\\left(2\\,{\\diamondsuit}\\uparrow\\,4\\right).\\tag{5.4.4.1}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Biv%7D%29.\" alt=\"\\rm{iv}).\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 对于复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2B2%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"1+2\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，给它乘上另一个负实数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-3\" alt=\"-3\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 得到 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=-3-6%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"-3-6\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。这相当于对复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2B2%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"1+2\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 做了一个纯负实数倍的拉长，即：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cgamma%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%2B%7D%5Cleft%281%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacklozenge%5E%2B%7D%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E-%7D%5C%2C%28-3%29%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%2B%7D%5Cleft%281%5C%2C%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacklozenge%5E%2B%7D%5C%2C+3%5Cright%29%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Cleftarrow%7D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%2B%7D3%3D-3.%5Ctag%7B5.4.4.2%7D\" alt=\"\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\gamma^{+\\to-}}=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\blacktriangle^+}\\left(1\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacklozenge^+}\\, \\left(\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacktriangle^-}\\,(-3)\\right)\\right)=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\blacktriangle^+}\\left(1\\,\\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\blacklozenge^+}\\, 3\\right)=\\underset{\\leftarrow}{\\blacktriangle^+}3=-3.\\tag{5.4.4.2}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%7Br%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%5Cuparrow%3D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%2B%7D%5Cdownarrow%5Cleft%282%5C%2C%7B%5Cblacklozenge%5E%2B%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E-%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C%28-3%29%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%2B%7D%5Cdownarrow%5Cleft%282%5C%2C%7B%5Cblacklozenge%5E%2B%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C+3%5Cright%29%3D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%2B%7D%5Cdownarrow6%3D-6.%5Ctag%7B5.4.4.3%7D\" alt=\"{r^{+\\to-}}\\uparrow={\\blacktriangle^+}\\downarrow\\left(2\\,{\\blacklozenge^+}\\uparrow\\, \\left({\\blacktriangle^-}\\uparrow\\,(-3)\\right)\\right)={\\blacktriangle^+}\\downarrow\\left(2\\,{\\blacklozenge^+}\\uparrow\\, 3\\right)={\\blacktriangle^+}\\downarrow6=-6.\\tag{5.4.4.3}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bv%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{v).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 对于复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csqrt%7B3%7D%2Bi\" alt=\"\\sqrt{3}+i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，给它乘上另一个复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1%2B%5Csqrt%7B3%7D%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"1+\\sqrt{3}\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 得到 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=4%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"4\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。这相对于先对复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Csqrt%7B3%7D%2Bi\" alt=\"\\sqrt{3}+i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 做了一个 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=60%5E%5Ccirc\" alt=\"60^\\circ\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的纯旋转：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%282%2C30%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D%29%5Cmapsto%5Cleft%282%5Cangle30%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D%5Cright%29%5Ccirclearrowleft60%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D%3D2%5Cangle90%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D.%5Ctag%7B5.4.4.4%7D\" alt=\"(2,30^{\\circ})\\mapsto\\left(2\\angle30^{\\circ}\\right)\\circlearrowleft60^{\\circ}=2\\angle90^{\\circ}.\\tag{5.4.4.4}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>变成复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2%5Ccdot+i\" alt=\"2\\cdot i\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 之后再拉长 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=2\" alt=\"2\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 倍：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbegin%7Barray%7D%7Bc%7D+%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow%7D%7B%5Cdelta_%7B%5Cmathrm%7BP.D.%7D%7D%5Cuparrow%7D%3D%5Cunderset%7B%5Crightarrow_%7B%5Cmathrm%7Bpas.%7D%7D%7D%7B%5Cdelta%5E%7B%280%2C%2B%29%5Cto%280%2C%2B%29%7D%5Cuparrow%7D%5C%5C+%7Br%5E%7B%2B%5Cto-%7D%7D%5Cuparrow%3D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%2B%7D%5Cuparrow%5Cleft%282+%5C%2C%7B%5Cblacklozenge%5E%2B%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C+%5Cleft%28%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%2B%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C2%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%2B%7D%5Cuparrow%5Cleft%282%5C%2C%7B%5Cblacklozenge%5E%2B%7D%5Cuparrow%5C%2C+2%5Cright%29%3D%7B%5Cblacktriangle%5E%2B%7D%5Cuparrow4%3D4.%5Ctag%7B5.4.4.5%7D+%5Cend%7Barray%7D\" alt=\"\\begin{array}{c} \\underset{\\rightarrow}{\\delta_{\\mathrm{P.D.}}\\uparrow}=\\underset{\\rightarrow_{\\mathrm{pas.}}}{\\delta^{(0,+)\\to(0,+)}\\uparrow}\\\\ {r^{+\\to-}}\\uparrow={\\blacktriangle^+}\\uparrow\\left(2 \\,{\\blacklozenge^+}\\uparrow\\, \\left({\\blacktriangle^+}\\uparrow\\,2\\right)\\right)={\\blacktriangle^+}\\uparrow\\left(2\\,{\\blacklozenge^+}\\uparrow\\, 2\\right)={\\blacktriangle^+}\\uparrow4=4.\\tag{5.4.4.5} \\end{array}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ccolor%7Bgreen%7D%7B%5Clarge%5Cblacksquare%7D\" alt=\"\\color{green}{\\large\\blacksquare}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>最后总结一下，如果在群的角度上理解代数运算的话我们实际上是将数字看成了一种作用，通过这种作用可以将原来的数字变成新的数字，所以说代数运算只不过是群作用的一种实际体现。</p><h2><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5CLarge%5Cbm%7B6.%7D\" alt=\"\\Large\\bm{6.}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 再看群同态与上帝公式和群论的关系</h2><p>在之前我们看到，以 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=e\" alt=\"e\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 为底的指数函数的运算律是群同态的一种体现。其实不止以 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=e\" alt=\"e\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 为底的指数函数，以其他大于零的实数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x\" alt=\"x\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 作为底数的指数函数也是群同态的一种体现。因为我们也有：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x%5E%7Ba%2Bb%7D%3Dx%5Ea%5Ccdot+x%5Eb.%5Ctag%7B6.1%7D\" alt=\"x^{a+b}=x^a\\cdot x^b.\\tag{6.1}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>现在我们假设 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=a%2C%5C%2Cb%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D\" alt=\"a,\\,b\\in\\mathbb{R}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，由于之前我们将实数的加法解释为了实数的滑动，将非零实数的乘法解释为了非零实数的伸缩，并且底数大于零的实指数函数的值域是 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D\" alt=\"\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。于是现在我们可以这样去理解 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x%5E%7Ba%2Bb%7D%3Dx%5Ea%5Ccdot+x%5Eb\" alt=\"x^{a+b}=x^a\\cdot x^b\" eeimg=\"1\"/>  ：<b><i>我们将实数的滑动</i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%7Ba%2Bb%7D\" alt=\"{a+b}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>作为输入，得到的是正实数的伸缩 </i></b>。这为我们提供了指数函数运算律的另一种理解方式。</p><p>那么基于这种理解方式，我们自然能想到是的：<b><i>以其他大于零的实数</i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x\" alt=\"x\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>作为底数的指数函数，当输入为复数的滑动时，输出的应是非零复数的旋转伸缩 </i></b>。那么这个结论是否正确呢？下面我们就来简单讨论一下。</p><p>不妨设：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=a%3A%3D%5Calpha%2B%5Cbeta%5Ccdot+i%2C%5C%2C%5C%2Cb%3A%3D%5Cgamma%2B%5Cdelta%5Ccdot+i%2C%5Cquad+%5Calpha%2C%5C%2C%5Cbeta%2C%5C%2C%5Cgamma%2C%5C%2C%5Cdelta%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D.%5Ctag%7B6.2%7D\" alt=\"a:=\\alpha+\\beta\\cdot i,\\,\\,b:=\\gamma+\\delta\\cdot i,\\quad \\alpha,\\,\\beta,\\,\\gamma,\\,\\delta\\in\\mathbb{R}.\\tag{6.2}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>则：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x%5E%7Ba%2Bb%7D%3Dx%5E%7B%28%5Calpha%2B%5Cbeta%5Ccdot+i%29%2B%28%5Cgamma%2B%5Cdelta%5Ccdot+i%29%7D%3Dx%5E%7B%28%5Calpha%2B%5Cgamma%29%2Bi%5Ccdot%28%5Cbeta%2B%5Cdelta%29%7D%3Dx%5E%7B%28%5Calpha%2B%5Cgamma%29%7D%5Ccdot+x%5E%7Bi%5Ccdot%28%5Cbeta%2B%5Cdelta%29%7D.%5Ctag%7B6.3%7D\" alt=\"x^{a+b}=x^{(\\alpha+\\beta\\cdot i)+(\\gamma+\\delta\\cdot i)}=x^{(\\alpha+\\gamma)+i\\cdot(\\beta+\\delta)}=x^{(\\alpha+\\gamma)}\\cdot x^{i\\cdot(\\beta+\\delta)}.\\tag{6.3}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>由于 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Calpha%2C%5C%2C%5Cgamma%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D\" alt=\"x\\in\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0},\\,\\alpha,\\,\\gamma\\in\\mathbb{R}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，所以 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x%5E%7B%28%5Calpha%2B%5Cgamma%29%7D%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D\" alt=\"x^{(\\alpha+\\gamma)}\\in\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，进而 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x%5E%7B%28%5Calpha%2B%5Cgamma%29%7D\" alt=\"x^{(\\alpha+\\gamma)}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 起到的是纯伸缩的作用。那么现在的问题是为什么 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x%5E%7Bi%5Ccdot%28%5Cbeta%2B%5Cdelta%29%7D\" alt=\"x^{i\\cdot(\\beta+\\delta)}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 起到的是纯旋转的作用呢？一种比较简单的解释方式是：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x%5E%7Bi%5Ccdot%28%5Cbeta%2B%5Cdelta%29%7D%3D%5Cexp%5Cleft%28%5Cln%5Cleft%28x%5E%7Bi%5Ccdot%28%5Cbeta%2B%5Cdelta%29%7D%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%5Cexp%5Cleft%28i%5Ccdot%5Cln%5Cleft%28x%5E%7B%28%5Cbeta%2B%5Cdelta%29%7D%5Cright%29%5Cright%29.%5Ctag%7B6.4%7D\" alt=\"x^{i\\cdot(\\beta+\\delta)}=\\exp\\left(\\ln\\left(x^{i\\cdot(\\beta+\\delta)}\\right)\\right)=\\exp\\left(i\\cdot\\ln\\left(x^{(\\beta+\\delta)}\\right)\\right).\\tag{6.4}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>由于 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D%2C%5C%2C%5Cbeta%2C%5C%2C%5Cdelta%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D\" alt=\"x\\in\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0},\\,\\beta,\\,\\delta\\in\\mathbb{R}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，所以 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x%5E%7B%28%5Cbeta%2B%5Cdelta%29%7D%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D_%7B%3E0%7D\" alt=\"x^{(\\beta+\\delta)}\\in\\mathbb{R}_{&gt;0}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，进而 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=+%5Cln%5Cleft%28x%5E%7B%28%5Cbeta%2B%5Cdelta%29%7D%5Cright%29%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D\" alt=\" \\ln\\left(x^{(\\beta+\\delta)}\\right)\\in\\mathbb{R}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。现在我们将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cln%5Cleft%28x%5E%7B%28%5Cbeta%2B%5Cdelta%29%7D%5Cright%29\" alt=\"\\ln\\left(x^{(\\beta+\\delta)}\\right)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 定义为 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ctheta\" alt=\"\\theta\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，则：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x%5E%7Bi%5Ccdot%28%5Cbeta%2B%5Cdelta%29%7D%3D%5Cexp%5Cleft%28i%5Ccdot%5Cln%5Cleft%28x%5E%7B%28%5Cbeta%2B%5Cdelta%29%7D%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%5Cexp%5Cleft%28i%5Ccdot%5Ctheta%5Cright%29.%5Ctag%7B6.5%7D\" alt=\"x^{i\\cdot(\\beta+\\delta)}=\\exp\\left(i\\cdot\\ln\\left(x^{(\\beta+\\delta)}\\right)\\right)=\\exp\\left(i\\cdot\\theta\\right).\\tag{6.5}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>这就说明了 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x%5E%7Bi%5Ccdot%28%5Cbeta%2B%5Cdelta%29%7D\" alt=\"x^{i\\cdot(\\beta+\\delta)}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 总是一个长度为 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=1\" alt=\"1\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的复数。所以它起到是复平面上的纯旋转作用。并且我们看到，以<b><i>任意一个大于零的实数</i></b> <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x\" alt=\"x\" eeimg=\"1\"/> <b><i>为底的指数函数将虚轴映射为复平面上的单位圆 </i></b>。也就是说给定一个非零复数，给它乘以一个 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cexp%28i%5Ccdot%5Ctheta%29\" alt=\"\\exp(i\\cdot\\theta)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 相当于使该复数纯旋转了角度 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Ctheta\" alt=\"\\theta\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。于是我们的又一个结论是(补 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbm%7B%5Crm%7BTheorem%5Cquad+5.4.1%7D%7D\" alt=\"\\bm{\\rm{Theorem\\quad 5.4.1}}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 中的复数的纯旋转找到对应关系)：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Crm%7Bvi%29.%7D\" alt=\"\\rm{vi).}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 非零复数的纯旋转对应于非零复数与复数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cexp%28i%5Ccdot%5Ctheta%29\" alt=\"\\exp(i\\cdot\\theta)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 的乘法。</p><p>现在让我们再看到 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x%5E%7Bi%5Ccdot%28%5Cbeta%2B%5Cdelta%29%7D\" alt=\"x^{i\\cdot(\\beta+\\delta)}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，现在我们将 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cbeta%2B%5Cdelta\" alt=\"\\beta+\\delta\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 定义为 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cxi%5Cin%5Cmathbb%7BR%7D\" alt=\"\\xi\\in\\mathbb{R}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。则：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x%5E%7Bi%5Ccdot%28%5Cbeta%2B%5Cdelta%29%7D%3Dx%5E%7Bi%5Ccdot%5Cxi%7D%3D%5Cexp%5Cleft%28i%5Ccdot%5Cln%5Cleft%28x%5E%7B%5Cxi%7D%5Cright%29%5Cright%29.%5Ctag%7B6.6%7D\" alt=\"x^{i\\cdot(\\beta+\\delta)}=x^{i\\cdot\\xi}=\\exp\\left(i\\cdot\\ln\\left(x^{\\xi}\\right)\\right).\\tag{6.6}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>就是说我们对以任意一个大于零的实数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x\" alt=\"x\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 为底的指数函数的指数上放置一个纯虚数 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=i%5Ccdot%5Cxi\" alt=\"i\\cdot\\xi\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，相当于在单位圆上从 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"0^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 开始转动了角度 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cln%5Cleft%28x%5E%7B%5Cxi%7D%5Cright%29\" alt=\"\\ln\\left(x^{\\xi}\\right)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，其在单位圆上从 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"0^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 开始转动的弧长也是 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cln%5Cleft%28x%5E%7B%5Cxi%7D%5Cright%29\" alt=\"\\ln\\left(x^{\\xi}\\right)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。则当 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=x%3De\" alt=\"x=e\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 时有：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=e%5E%7Bi%5Ccdot%5Cxi%7D%3D%5Cexp%5Cleft%28i%5Ccdot%5Cln%5Cleft%28e%5E%7B%5Cxi%7D%5Cright%29%5Cright%29%3D%5Cexp%28i%5Ccdot+%5Cxi%29.%5Ctag%7B6.7%7D\" alt=\"e^{i\\cdot\\xi}=\\exp\\left(i\\cdot\\ln\\left(e^{\\xi}\\right)\\right)=\\exp(i\\cdot \\xi).\\tag{6.7}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><p>也就是说以 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=e\" alt=\"e\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 为底的指数函数的特殊之处在于，当其指数为 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=i%5Ccdot%5Cxi\" alt=\"i\\cdot\\xi\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 时，其在单位圆上从 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"0^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 开始转动的角度恰好也是 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cxi\" alt=\"\\xi\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，并且在单位圆上从 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"0^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 开始转动的弧长也是 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cxi\" alt=\"\\xi\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。更为特殊的，当 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cxi%3D%5Cpi\" alt=\"\\xi=\\pi\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 时， <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=e%5E%7Bi%5Ccdot%5Cpi%7D\" alt=\"e^{i\\cdot\\pi}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 表示的是：在单位圆上从 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"0^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 开始转动的角度为 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cpi%5Coverset%7B%5Ctriangle%7D%7B%3D%7D180%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"\\pi\\overset{\\triangle}{=}180^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，并且在单位圆上从 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"0^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 开始转动的弧长也是 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cpi\" alt=\"\\pi\" eeimg=\"1\"/> ，而在单位圆上从 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=0%5E%7B%5Ccirc%7D\" alt=\"0^{\\circ}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 开始转动弧长 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%5Cpi\" alt=\"\\pi\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 后到达的点是 <img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=%28-1%2C0%5Ccdot+i%29\" alt=\"(-1,0\\cdot i)\" eeimg=\"1\"/> 。因此，在这种意义上我们有：</p><p><img src=\"https://www.zhihu.com/equation?tex=e%5E%7Bi%5Ccdot%5Cpi%7D%3D-1.%5Ctag%7B6.8%7D\" alt=\"e^{i\\cdot\\pi}=-1.\\tag{6.8}\" eeimg=\"1\"/> </p><hr/><p></p>\n<br><br>\n来源：知乎 www.zhihu.com<br>\n
